awukhiphe edoshaneni awufake ngaphansi kolimi kube iqhutshana lapha ngezani kodebe lomlomo lwangezansi

nazi ke izinjongo esifisa ukuzifeza uma sifundisa ulimi iwasekhaya injongo yokuqala yokafundisa ulimi ngukunika abafundi ithuba lokutfunda ukucabanga
imfundo yoqobo yileyo enika umfundi inhlakanipho namandla okucabanga
empeleni impumelelo yempilo yemihla ngemihla itholwa kuphela yilabo abakwaziyo ukucabanga
akwanele nje ukukwozi ukocabanga kahle bese ukbuluma noma ikanjani noma ukwazi ukukbuluma ulimi kodwa ungakwazi ukulusebenzisa ekucabangeni kahle
sesishilo ukuthi umuntu ongakwazi ukukhuluma kahle akakwazi ukucabanga kahle
sesiyokhumbula ke ukuthi zonke izifundo zethu zolimi mazisize umntwana ukuba asebenzise umqondo njalo
injongo yesibili ngeyokusiza umntwana ukuba afunde ukukhuluma ngokuyikho angalokbu ebambeka noma engingiza 
kungase kwenzeke ukuba umuntu alufunde alwazi kahle ulimi iwakhe ngakho ke alusebenzise ngokuyikho ekucabangeni uma eyedwa
uma elokhu ekbuluma ngokubambeka nokweswela amagama akawakbiphi kahle umqondo wakhe
kuswelekile abantwana bafundiswe ukukbuluma kahle ngokuchachile umqondo bawuveze kahle
injongo yesithathu iyahambisana nayo eyesibili engakweneka imicabango nza ubhala ngendlela echachile etshengisa ukubumbana komqondo
noma kungase kabe iqiniso ukuthi umuntu okwaziyo ukukbuluma ufanele ukukwazi ukubhala kahle lokhu akuzenzekeli ngokwako
kufanele abantwana batundiswe ukucabanga kahle ukukbuluma kahle futhi ke batundiswe nokuyeneka kahle imiqondo etubhaleni
imiqondo ebhaliwe ifinyelela kubantu abaningi abakude abasezindaweni eziningi ngisho noma umbhali engasekho
ukukbuluma kugcina kuphela kulabo okbuluma nabo ngalesosikhathi okbuluma ngaso
injongo yesine ebaluleke kakbulu ngukufundisa umntwana ukuba ajwayele ukufunda izincwadi ezibhaliwe ngenhlakanipho akhuthazeke ukuba aqhubele phambili uthando lokufunda izincwadi
akwanele nje ukuba abantwana bakwazi uluzifundela okubhaliwe
baningi abantwana abathi bekwazi ukufunda bagcine ukufunda incwadi mhla bephuma esikoleni
imfundo ekbipha abantwana abanje ayiphumelde s neze
uthando lokufunda lufanele lutshalwe kubantwana lukhule lze luvuthwe ukuze umkhuba omuhle wokuphucuzeka wokuzitholela ulwozi nentokozo ezincwadini ukuziqhuba ekuhlakanipheni nasekuchitheni isizungu ugxile kubantwana noma sebebadala
sifuna ukagcizelela ukuthi lenjongo ibaluleke kakhulu futhi ayikabonakali ukulezeka kubantwana bomdabu
ukufezeka kwayo kuyoya ngokuthi abantwana batundiswa kanjani lezizifundo
injongo yesihlanu ihambisana nayo eyesine
lokbu kusho ukuthi ngaphezu kwezincwadi ezimiselwe ukubundwa eklasini kufanele abantwana bakhuthaxwe ukuba bazifundele ngokwabo bazitholele ulwazi bakhulise uthando lokufunda
uma ingase iphumelele lenjongo ukutezeka lokho kunganika umdlandla nokukhuthazeka kubabhali bolimi iwasekhaya kwandise ukuhamba kwemiqondo phakathi kwabantu 
umntwana osewazejwayeza ukutunda usengalokhu etapa nje emcetsheni wolimi oqukethwe yizincwadi akwazi futhi nokuchitha isizungu ngendlela enosizo
injongo yokugcina yokulundisa ulimi iwasekhaya ngukuvezela umotwana ukuba azibonele yena ubuhle besakhiwo solimi oluyilifa elabunjwa lashiywa ngawokhokho bakhe
noma iyiphi into eyakhiwe kufanele umniniyo ayazi ukuthi yakbiwe kanjani nokuthi isebenza kanjani
lolulwazi lumenza ayisebenzise ngokuyikho ngemithetho yemvelo yayo angayiphathi ngokunganaki enziwa ukunganaki ukufisa ukwazi ngakhoke engazi
uma umuntu ehlaziya into eyihlela ngesakhiwo sayo uye athole intokozo ebuboneni ubuhle bokwakbiwa kwayo
isibonelo esihle ngesemoto umninimoto osaziyo kahle isakhiwo sayo nokusebenza kwayo uyakwazi ukuyiphatha kahle imnike intokozo enkulu
izifundo zohlelo zifundiselwa ukuleza lenjongo
kodwa injongo enkulu ngukuba abantwana bafunde ukulusebenzisa ulimi ekukhulumeni nasekubhaleni uma beveza lokho okusemqondweni wabo
yilezi ke izinjongo okufanele zibe semqondweni wabo bonke abaphathelene nokufundisa ulimi
ngaphambi kokuba singene ke ekukhulumeni ngezindlela zokufundisa iziqephu ezahlukene zolimi ezahlukweni ezilandelayo sifuna ukugcizelela nje ukuthi ulimi yinto ephilayo esebenzayo
ngakho ke indlela yokulundisa ulimi noma ngakube iyiphi makube yileyo egcizelela ukulusebenzisa ulimi
ikakhulukazi emaklasini aphansi amagama ohlelo makasetshenziswe nje ekuchazeni kodwa kungasweleki ukuba abantwana bafunde imithetho ngekhanda bengayiboni ukuthi iqhamukaphi
lokho kusho ukuthi bangayazi imithetho ikakbulu emaklasini asephakeme kodwa ukuze babone ububle bolimi kufanele imithetho ouselwe olimini oluphilayo nolusebenzayo abantwana bezibonela bona
lezizinjongo zisuselwe ezisekelweni esesikhulume ngazo
zonke izifundo ezihleliwe zakhishwa ngabomnyango wemfundo zimumethe lezizinjongo
amaphepha okuhlolwa adinga ulwazi iwalezizinjongo ahlola ukuthi zifezekile na ekufundiseni
zonke izincwadi ezibhaliwe zolimi zizama ukuhola abafundi nothisha ukuba bafeze lezizinjongo
ngakho ke ukubhalwa kwamagama ngokuyikho  ukusebenzisa izimpawu ngokuyikho ukuhlela nokuhlahlela imisho konke lokhu kwenzelwa ukuba ulimi lusetshenziswe kahle
zonke lezizifundo uma uzithatha ngazinye uzehlukanisa nenjongo yazo azisho lutho
ukuxoxwa nokubhalwa kwendaba ukusetshenziswa kolimi kanye nohlelo konke lokhu kufanele kubukwe njengento eyodwa ebumbene eqonde ukafeza lezizinjongo
incwadi ebhalwe ngondlovu nangoshange nangobuthelezi isizulu a ikugcizelela kahle lokhu ukubundiswa kolimi
ulimi silufundisa ngobuphelele balo
ulimi luyisifundo esiphambili ekukhuliseni umntwana ekuhlakanipheni naselucabangeni
lendlela yamanje yokutundisa ulimi yenza ulimi luthole umfutho omusha nobumnandi obulufaka amandla ukuba luthandeke
inkinga elandelayo ngeyokuthi zingafezwa kanjani lezizinjongo
ngamanye amazwi sekofanele sibuze ubuthi yiziphi izindlela esingahamba ngazo namasu esingawasebenzisa ukuze sifeze leznjongo
imibuzo emithathu esemqoka ekutundiseni yilena yini efundiswayo  if undisehoani
if undiswa kanyani  umbuzo wokuqala kulula ukuwnphendula ngoba umnyango wemfundo uyalukhipha ublelo iwozifundo oloqukethe izihloko ezifanele ukufundiswa
futhi zikhona izincwadi ezibeka obala lokho okofanele ukufundwa
umbuzo wesibili sesiwnphendulile ngokuchaza izinjongo esahlukweni esidlule
manje ke sesizozema ukweneka izindlela ezikhomba ukuthi makuqhutshwe kanjani lapho sekufundiswa izifundo zolimi
ngaphambi kokuba sineke lezizindlela zokueundisa sifuna ukuba kukhunjulwe ukuthi ukutundisa ngumsebenzi walowo nalowothisha ebhekene neklasi lelo elingeze lafana nelinye
ngakho ke kufanele ukuba yilowo nalowothisha acabangisise kshle ukuthi uma esebhekene neklasi lakhe nesifundo esithile esisohlelweni lokuba asifundise ngaleyomizuzwana yangalelolanga uyomisa kanjani
lapha siyagcizelela ukuthi akekho uthisha ofana nomunye
alikho iklasi elifana nelinye
isimo sezinto kuleso nalesosikole asifani
lokbu ke kusho ukuthi izindlela zokulundisa kaziyukafana kubo bonke othisha
ngakho ke yilowo nalowothisha makabe nenjongwana yakhe yalesosikhathi yaleloklasi lakhe
lezizinjongwana ziyohlukahlukana njengokuhlukana kwawothisha namaklasi
isibonelo nje nasi ezifundweni zokuxoxa uthisha ofundisa edolobbeni elinengxubevange yezilimi unobunzima bokulungisa iziphosiso zokuxubanisa izilimi kanti uthisha ofundisa lapho kukhulunywa isizulu esiqondile akayikuba nayo lenkinga
ekulundiseni inkondlo ethile yilowo nalowothisha angaba nenjongwana yakhe njengokuhlola uluthi umbhali uyibhale kanjani walusebenzisa kanjani ulimi noma injongo kungaba ngukuhluza umqondo oqukethwe yileyonkondlo
ukuze kutezeke izinjongo esesikhulume ngazo esahlukweni esidlule uhlelo iwezifundo luhlukaniswe iziqephu ezintathu
sizothatha leziziqephu ezintathu sikhombe ingqikithi yazo ngamaphuzu ayizihloko ezifundwayo ebangeni  kuya kwibanga 
kodwa ke emabangeni angaphansi nangaphezulu kwalawa iziqephu zokutundiswa kolimi zihamba ngalendlela
ebhalwayo nexoxwayo elandisayo indaba impilo yomuntu othile noma into ethile ubalanda ngovakubonayo ukuqedela indaba
echazayo izinto izindawo izenzelco izehlakalo abantu njolonjelo
inkulumo ukunqakisana ngenkulumo phakathi kwabantu
ukubhalwa kwencwadi eya kumngane noma kumhlobo wakho
ukunweba noma ukufinyeza isigaba sephrosi noma inkondlo incwadi yocingo
ezinye izihloko zokusebenza kolimi izaga nezisho
izifengqo zokukbuluma
umsebenzi wamagama emshweni
umsebenzi wephimbo ekuvezeni umqondo 
ukuhahlela igama libe yizakfu
ukwakhiwa kwamagama kwezinye izingcezu zenkulumo
ukuhlangatuswa nohlhlahlelwa kwemisho 
makukbunjulwe ukuthi lezizincwadi kazibona othisha ngakho ke azifundisi
zimiselwe nje ukuhlahla indlela zihole othisha ukuthi yitu efanele ukufundiswa bese zisiza abalundi ukuba basebenze izivivinyo ezikulezozincwadi ukuze kugcizeleleke ulwazi iwabo iwamaphuzu athile olimi nohlelo
ngakho ke akwanele ukaba uthisha adamane athathe lezizincwadi nabantwana bavule ezabo besekwenziwa izivivinyo qha
kufanele uthisha aqale ngokatundisa impela afake impilo nobujnnandi nothando ezifundweni
khumbulani ukuthi ubufundisa kwempela ngukubhekana kukathisha nabantwana kuthintane imiqondo nemiphefumulo yabo ngendlela eyenza ukuba abantwana bavuleke imiqondo ibone ebikade ingakuboni icabange ikhule ekuhlakanipheni
rusobala ke ukuthi akufunakali ncwadi ngesikhathi kufundiswa
kuphela kofuneka umqondo kathisha ejonge ukuleza izinjongo ezithile esebenzisa ingqikithi ethile eyiphakela abantwana ngezindlela namasu athile
sesibonile ke izinjongo okuqondwe ukuba zifezwe ekokbuliseni umqondo womfundi
sibonile futhi izihloko ezimiselwe ukutundiswa
umiando wokufundiswa kwozilimi zomdabu zaseafrika noma sesishilo ekuqaleni ukuthi amasu obufundisa ancike ezinjongweni okuhloswe ukuba zifezwe nokho ukuze lawamasu azwakale kahle make siqale siwandlalele kafushane ngomlando wokufundiswa kwalezizilimi
lokhu sikwenza ngoba indlela esetshenziswayo namuhla isalokhu itshengisa umsuka wayo ezikhathini zakodala ikakhulukazi ekufundiseni uhlelo
abefundisi bevangeli lobukrestu babona ukuthi ivangeli liyongena kalula uma lifundiswa ngolimi iwasekhaya
ngalesisizathu lababefundisi bokuqala bafundisa abathile bomdabu ukuba bakwazi ukufunda nokubhala ukuze bakwazi ukwelekelela ekuqhubeni ivangeli nokungenisa ukholo kwabanye
nokho ke kulezozikhathi kwakuswelekile ukuba labo ababezoqhubeka nemfundo yabo ukuze baqonde kangcono izwi lenkosi bafunde nolimi iwezizwe njengesingisi noma isifrentshi
kwakuswelekile lokhu rgoba amagama aqukethe lemiqondo emisha yokholo ayengekho olimini iwasekhaya
ukuze kube yimanje kusekhona impikiswano enkulu yokuthi ulimi iwasekhaya alukabi nawo amandla okuqukatha imiqondo yolwazi olunjengolwesayensi nezibalo zemathimathiki
nokho ke abefundisi laba bokuqala basungula izindlela zokubhala lezizilimi zomdabu noma umbhalomagama  baqoqa nezinhlu zamagama 
kamuva kwahunyushwa izigaba ezithile zebhayibheli emva kokwakhiwa kwezichazimazwi 
ngalendlela isisekelo sokukhula kwezilimi zomdabu zaseafrika njengezilimi ezibhaliweyo sabekoka
ulimi oluthile lomdabu iwasecongo yilona olwaqala ukubhalwa kwezaseafrika engenzansi kwenkabazwe 
incwadi yokuqala kulolulimi kwaba yikhathekizima labefundisi baseangola ngo 
isichazimazwi kulolulimi ngesikabrusciotto esaphuma ngo 
ngo  kwaphuma incwadi yohlelo yalolulimi
asiqondile ukujula emlandweni wokukhula kwezilimi zomdabu zaseafrika
lapha sifuna ukuveza amagama nje abanumzane awoappleyard nobryant nodohne nocolenso ababa yizingqalabutho ekubhaleni izilimi zabomdabu womzansi afrika
naye kodwa wayebuka izilimi zaseafrika ngehlo lasejalimani
umoumzane doke waqhamuka nendlela entsha ekufundiseni isizulu
umqondo wakhe wolimi wawususela esisekelweni semisindo ekuphimiseni kwegama 
wahlukanisa izingcezu zenkulumo mayelana nomsebenzi owenziwa yilelo nalelogama emshweni njengokuthi nje umuntu yibizo nomuntu yisandiso
lendlela kadoke yinhle kakhulu ekuhleleni ulimi inobuciko besayensi
kuze kube yiminyaka eyingcosana edlule lendlela yakhe beyigcizelelwa kakhulu ekutundiseni isizulu
kepha uma sihlola izinjongo esiqonde ukuaifeza ezikoleni eziphansi kanye nezamasekhondari siyatunyanisa ukuthi lendlela kadoke kayisizi
ulimi oluphilayo olusebenzayo empilweni yemihla ngemihla kalunakile imithetho yohlelo ngendlela yesayensi
lokhu kusho ukuthi ukuze umuntu akwazi ukusebenzisa ulimi ngokuyikho akuswelekile ukuba elokhu ekhumbula imithetho yohlelo
lokhu akusho ukuthi umsebenzi kadoke siyawujivaza cha
umsebenzi wakhe mkhulu kakhulu uyancomeka futhi ufanele ukufundwa
esikushoyo nje ngukuthi ukubundisa isizulu ezikoleni zabomdabu ngendlela kadoke kuphela kakuzifezi izinjongo zokubundiswa kolimi njengoba sizibekile ekuqaleni kwalencwadi
yingakho ke izifundo zohlelo zibunjwe zaxutshaniswa nokusetshenziswa kolimi oluphilayo
leliphuzu siligcizelela ngoba bekuvamile esikhathini esingaphambili ukuba othisha besizulu babundise nje kuphela uhlelo njengoba lukbishwe ngudoke bangagcizeleli ngokwanele ukusetshenziswa kolimi 
uma sibuka emlandweni wokukbula kolimi nokufundiswa kwalo ezizweni zaseyurophu siyafunyanisa ukuthi kuze kabe sekupheleni kwekhulu leminyaka edlule  isu elalisetshenziswa kwakungukofundisa uhlelo nje kuhlolwe isakhiwo salo nemithetho yohlelo okwakbiwe phezu kwayo ulimi
kulomhlangano kwavunyelwana ukuthi uma kueundwa ulimi kudingekile ukoba kutholakale ulwazi oluphelele iwempimiso yemisindo 
kuthintwe imithetho yesakbiwo solimi evamile olimini lolo
kungabibikho ukueundisa uhlelo nje ngendlela engathintene nokusebenza kolimi
imithetho yohldo ifanele iphume ekuhloleni nasdruhlaziyeni izibonelo eziningi ezitshengisa uhakhdra nokubumbeka kocezu oluthile iwenkulumo
umfundi makaluzwe ulimi lukbulunywa yilabo abalzi kahle naye alukbulume alufunde alubhale lokhu akuphindaphinde
uma bekhuluma mabasebenzise imisho ephdele kungaeundwa nje izinhla zamagama ezimele wodwa
lezizinqumo zalomhlangano sizibeke lapha uluze kuvele ukukhula kwendlda yokueundiswa kwezilimi dcahambeni kwesikhathi emhlabuhlangene waseningizimu yeafrika izilimi zezizwe zomdabu zakhula nazo masinyane ekubhalweni nasekulundisweni njengoba amasonto enkolo kanye nezikole kuya ngokwanda
njengoba umthetho omkhulu wemfundo uthi ukubunda ngolimi umatwana aluncela kunina kuyikhona okuphambili ikakhulukazi ezigabeni eziphansi saba khona isifiso nesidingo sokusebenzisa izilimi zekhaya emfundweni
kepha ukwesweleka kwezincwadi ezibhalwe ngalezizilimi zamumatha ulwazi kwasweldca ukuba kusheshe kusetshenziswe izilimi zokufa ezikoleni
lokhu kwadala ubunzima kumatwana ozoqala akhulume olunye ulimi dhaya uyaqambe uyafika esikoleni usekhuluma olunye ulimi iwezizwe afunde ngalo ulwazi olusha
lobubunzima buyabonakala kakhulu dcuhlolweni kwasesigabeni sokuphetha imfundo yasesikoleni kwamatikulesheni lapho izinga lemiphumela yabantwana bomdabu liphansi kakhulu
indlela esemqoka yokafundisa ulimi ezikoleni ngakho ke indlela eyiyo yokufundisa ulimi kufanele ukuba yileyo yokulusebenzisa
othisha mabazame ngesibonelo nangokukhuthaza abantwana ukuthoh iniolumo echachile eqondile engenakundiyazela
indlela ngqo yiyona engeyemvelo ekaeundiseni ukukhuluma nokuxoxa
umntwana omncane uma eqala ulueunda ulimi ueunda lotho akubonayo akuzwayo okuthintene naye akuthandayo okulusizo empilweni yakhe
uma impilo yakhe seyenziwe yathintana nento ethile uzifisela yena ngokwakhe ulwazi uluthi igama laleyonto lithini
ngalendlela ufunda ulimi ngokuyikho
ezifundweni zokufunda encwadini abantwana mabafundiswe ukulunda ngendlela ekuveza obala lokho okuqukethwe yimibhalo
mabatshengise ukuyizwa into abayifundayo
ngalendlela umqondo oqukethwe yilokho okubhaliwe uyavaka uphile kube sengathi uyakhulunywa
ezikoleni eziphansi makugcizeldwe lokhukufunda abantwana baze bakwazi ukubona ngeso lomcabango lokho abakofundayo
ezikoleni zamasekhondari abantwana sebengaqala ukwejwayezwa ukuzifundela buthula ngakwabo
phela yiyona ndlela le abayokuyisebenzisa kskhulu empilweni yabo yemibla ngemihla uma sebebadala
njengoba ulimi lubunjwa lulolongwe yizingcweti ezingababhali abanekhono kufanele ukuba abantwana bejwayezwe ulufunda  ncwadi ezibhaliwe yilezizingcweti
lokhukuzifundela izincwadi buthula kublose ukudala uthando olungapheli lokuxifundela nolwazi olujulile iwemibhalo 
kwesinye isikhathi uthisha angatundda abantwana izinkondlo nezigaba  ezimnandi zephrosi ulcuze bafimane ubumnandi nentokozo kulobubohle
mabaholwe ukaba baze bagcine sebekwazi ukuzibonela bazikhethele bona izinkondlo ezibhalwe ngobuciko
ezinye zalezizinkondlo nezigaba zephrosi ezibahlaba hwele abantwana bangazifunda ngekhanda bakwazi ukuxiqeketha njengezilandelo
izifundo zokusetshenziswa kolimi lapho kofundwa izaga nezisho nezifengqo namagama anlllobonhlobo makugcizelelwe ulwazi lokusebenzisa ulimi
akusizi lutho ukwazi uhla olude iwezaga noma amagama kanye nencezelo yawo uma umuntu engakwazi ukuwasebenzisa nxashana ekhuluma nalapho ebhala
abantwana mabaye ngokabancono ekukwazini ukusebenzisa ulimi ekwenekeni imicabango nemiawa yabo ngendlela ethe ngqo 
izifundo zohlelo mazijonge ukuveza ububle besakbiwo solimi
lesisakbiwo masivele ngokuhlola ulimi olusebenzayo
lokhu kusho ukuthi makungagcizelelwa imithetho yohlelo nje yokubumbeka kwamagama nemisho
ezahlukweni ezilandelayo sizothatha leziziqephu ngasinye sihlole ukuthi yiziphi izindlela ezingalandelwa ukuze ukufundiswa kwazo kuphumelele ekafezeni izinjongo
umoya kathisha kodwa ke okusemqoka ngaphezulu kwalezizindlela ngumoya kathisha awutshengisayo mayelana nesifundo sakhe
okokuqala okubunekayo kuthisha nguthando lolimi kulabo abalufundisayo
uma uthisha engatshengisi umdlandla nentshisekelo nothando ekufundiseni ingeke ibonakale impumelelo ekufezeni izinjongo
okwesibili okuswelekayo nguluba uthisha ahlale engumfundi nomcwaningi wolimi 
umfundi ke ngumuntu ohlala efisa efuna ukwazi
ngakho ke akufanele ukuba uthisha ofundisa isizulu kube khona incwadi yesizulu angayazi
lokhu akusho ukuthi usengatunda zonke izinewadi ezishicilelwe ikakhulu njengoba seziya ngokwanda nje
rodwa lokbu kusho ukuthi makazazi ukuthi zikhona futhi azimisele ukuba agcine ezifundile
uma ekhuthele kanje nabantwana abatundisayo uyobafaka lenkuthalo ngesibondo sakhe
uma enze nje uyogcina eseluqweqwe esifundweni sakhe
ulimi ke lukhula ngalendlela
akuyona into efanele le ukuba uthisha elokhu abundisa lokho ayckufundisa eminyakeni eyishumi eyedlula ngendlela efanayo
ayikho inqubekela phambili uma kunje
okwesithathu kubuneka uthisha ngomoya wakhe wothando iwesifundo kanye nezingane azifundisayo azilungiselele kahle izifundo zakhe ngobuqotho nokwethembeka 
uma enze nje uyothola ubumnandi ekutundiseni
uma ekhuluma uyokhululeka ngoba ekhuluma ngento ayaziyo
impumelelo yezifundo eziningi ibulawa nguthisha engenalo ulwazi olwanele iwesifundo sakhe
ngokuhola abantwana ukuba baye batike ekujuleni kwalenqolobana  uyovusa imizwa yabo ukuba babone ubohle nomcebo osezincwadini
uma enje uyokwazi ukwehlela ezingeni labantwana athole intokozo ekubachazeleni ngokuchachile lokho abakudingayo kunokuba abbmeze ngolaka

kuphume ngisho esinedolo sizozidelisa ngalezizinsizwa ezikwazi ukwenza imihlolo
zihambe zilala zivuka ziyolanda imvula emajukujukwini
hhayi ke lapho kwajatshulwa kwanjeya
amabutho esho kancane ehuba ingoma yokunqoba
omame bamatasatasa bethunga utshwala kuphuma izithebe zenyama zilandelana
abafana laba otajewo nomeromo sebehlobe ngezamaqhawe
lomcimbi wokugubha ukufika kwezinsizwa zemvula wathatha izinsuku ezicishe zibe yishumi
bayizeka indaba yohambo lwabo kwamanye amabutho
njalo indaba ixoxwa lapho sekuhlwile uma sekothiwa umlilo
izinsizwa nezintombi zilalele nje kanti sezizoqamba ihubo ngohambo lwasentabeni ilengayi
ngelanga lokugcina zayishaya izinsizwa nezintombi zamamasayi lengoma
zayihuba kwenanela omame ngezigubhu
kuthe lapho ziphetha khona lengoma yohambo oluya entabeni engcwele ilengayi bonke abantu bawa phansi ngamadolo begebise amakhanda
lezwakala ikhehla elidala lesigodi likhuleka sakushweleza engayi mphi wempilo mphi wezimvula
siyakubonga siyakudumisa
yashaya amaconsi ngokushesha kwageleza amanzi yonke indawo
imihosha nemifudlana kwagcwala ngokuphazima kweso
nabantu babuyela emizini yabo sebengamayoywana imvula

isingeniso leliqoqo lemidlalo emifushane livele ngenxa yemizamo yabashicileli ukukhuthaza ukubhalwa kwemidlalo okulokhu kusemuva kunazo zonke izinhlobo zemibhalo yobuciko esizulwini
lababashicileli bahlela ukuba kube nomncintiswano wababhali
izindaba ezine ezingasekuqaleni kuleliqoqo zibhalelwe ukudlalwa enkundleni phambi kwezibukeli
nokho lapha kulinganisiwe nje ukuthi uma lemidlalo isidlalwa ngempela yikuphi okusemqoka abangakwenza abayidlalisayo
okunye bangazicabangela bazifakele njengoba bebona
izindaba ezimbili ezingasekugcineni zazibhalelwe ukusakazwa emoyeni
zombili sezake zasakazwa
zehlukile lezi ngoba azibhalelwe yona inkundla
uma umuntu ezifunda kumele acabange ukuthi zingezwakala kanjani uma ziphuma emsakazweni
sikholwa ukuthi lomzamo wethu kulomunxa ongakabhuduleki uzosiza ekuheheni abanye ababhali ukuba kebagiye kulenkundla
nayo ize icoleke njengoba sekucoleke nezinye
ababhali rr isigcawu sokuqala kusekhishini lesimanje linefenisha yekhishi njengefiliji nesitofu netafula nezihlalo
nakhona uma singathula nje inkosi ingeke isinike okuningi
phela ukuba bekuya ngami ngabe sengithi mntanomntanami nje kulamalanga
uthi ukukhumbule nje ukuthi unyoko useneminyaka emingaki ashona ngipheka
angigugile kangako ukuthi ngingeke ngakwazi ukupheka
into ibhodwe akusiyona intanga yendoda
ngiyavuma baba ukuthi isimide iminyaka umama asishiya
hhayi ke mina ndodana nginemisebenzi eminingi engingayenza ngaphandle kokupheka
umsebenzi wenu nawo akumsebenzi walutho ndodana
khona manje kukhona ubugelekeqe obuningi lapha emhlabeni obungeke belashwa nguthishela noma ngudokotela
usuke umthole nje namhlanje umfazi ehamba ephethe isikhwama semali budedengu
isatholakala nje imali ezikhwameni ezingasemuva zamadoda
wenzani ubaba engibuka sengathi lento   l engikhuluma ngayo yinsumansumane
amasela antshontsha izimoto enza imali eningi baba
kepha umonakalo abewenzayo mubi mkhulu kakhulu futhi
uyazi baba kulonyaka nje kuntshontshwe izimoto ezingaphezu kwenkulungwane
iningi lazo zasiwa ezindaweni ezikude lapho ziyothengiswa khona
zithengisiwe futhi eziningi
uma ingenamshwalense kuphelile ushonile umniniyo
ukuba lento yake yakuvelela baba ngabe uyangizwisisa
mina ngiyabezwela ngempela abaninizimoto
nami ndodana ngiyabezwela impela
ngikhuluma nje umama umkababa unzimande usesibhedlela ngenxa yokukhathazeka
ubaba unzimande naye ungathi uzohlanya
ngeke ngiphumule ngingalibambanga lelisela eliyintshontshile
umuntu angaze afele ekhaya yindlala
mina ngisalungile okwamanje
ngizobuye ngipheke uphuthu
kanti futhi into engiphethe kabi kakhulu yiyo lena kanzimande
nakhu baba akubambe umoya
kodwa ngifuna ukuyifunisisa lendaba
uthi ubekhipha imali kulemishini yemali yasebhange eyipake buqamama nje nomshini lowo
uthi uthe ethi phapha yabe isingekho njalo imoto
uthi usuke akaze akhiya uma ephuma emotweni ngoba ebengezukuchitha sikhathi emshinini lowo
mhlawumbe bebemcuphile nje
ungazi ngani onzimande nabo bekhuphuka ngokuphazima kweso nje ukuthi bayitholaphi imali thina singenayo nje
phela siyaqeqeshwa uma sifundela ubuphoyisa
lokhu okumvelele umhuzukwana nje
kazi iyiphi ingane yomuntu eyokumela lokhu
uthi usayitsheni angiphuthume ngize eshantshi khona manje
ake ngiyobona ukuthi amakhosi ami angisaphi
bekufike amaphoyisa ezomtshela ukuthi ayamfuna epolisiteshi
bathi eze khona manje
angangibulala undoda uma engezwa ukuthi nginikela izingane ucingo olukhokhelwa nguye
yithi ngizame nje futhi
ngibuya khona epolisiteshi njengoba ungibona ngifika ngemoto yamaphoyisa
ndoda ewu baba ngingabuye ngithini ngoba nakho sebeqoke ntina
phoke yini into engingayenza uma sekukhonjwe mina
ungakhohlwa ukuthi lababantu abenza lezizinto bahamba nezikhali eziyingozi
kungcono nje ngoba umthetho kuthiwa unengalo ende
angikwazi ukuthi ngingakutshela khona
nanka nanka eduze kwami
ngiyalizwa iphunga lokuwabamba
phela baba sesakwazi ukunuka imikhondo njengamachalaha enuka umkhondo wenyamazane
mwmeka noma kunjalo ndodana kunengozi ukudelela umqondo obukhali wengwevu
phela ngiyingwevu uma nginje ndodana
kade ngangiphila emhlabeni
sithe uma senza lento yethu epolisiteshi sathi kungakhulunywa ukuthi senzeni
ngeke ke baba ngalephula  lelogama lami ngephule isethembiso
ake ngifune into yokubhala ngibhale phansi kapteni
khona namhlanje kapteni
asenzenjani amasela akho
awu ndoda yamadoda mina bengithi unesibindi
sekwenzenjani masishane kangaka
awu ndoda musa ukungidumaza ndodana
ndoda into enkulu ngukuthi basho amalanga nezinyanga ebekwenziwa ngazo lomsebenzi
okungabafana lokhu uma kungezwa ngozankosi kuvele kabhede nje
njengoba bengibhala nje bengibhala amalanga ebenizeba ngawo
hhayi kukhona ongakuhlolanga kahle mntanami
ngafunga ukuthi ngiyabamba wonke umuntu oweqa umthetho
ngibanjwe wuwe ingane yami
kunewodilophu nekhabethe okunamashalofu
ubani kodwa owayecabanga ukuthi ungubane insizwa ebiphile saka ingaphoqoka ngokuphazima kweso ngalendlela
sesifisa okwezinkukhu zibulawa uphenyane ngane kaxaba
thina sathi nje ukushada sathatha umshwalense wethu sobabili
nxa sithola ingane yethu yokuqala kwaba yiso leso
awu kepha nathi sasithi sizohlala iminyakana noma elishumi nobaba nkosi yami
iminyaka emine qhwaba pho lethiwe
kodwa singathini ngane yomuntu
izinto azilandeli luhlelo
yikho nje phela ukuthi nina nashada nisandakushiya isikole ningakasebenzi nokutheni ningakabi namali
yikho nje ukuthi imadlana ayeyithola yayingeyimbi kangako
noyise wamsiza ke ngokulungisela umshado
nangu naye esesishiya
bheka umntakangubane ayoshayiswa isidakwa ebe yena engaphuzi ngisho iwayini  lodwa leli
ngiyamesaba usathane ngengane yomuntu ezilungele kangaka
kodwa manje okungamasentshana khona kungakanani
wyiswa kungakanani kuphi lethiwe besisasebenzela indlu nje ngane yakwethu
angithi lendlu yasibiza inkulungwane yamarandi
umnikazi wendlu phela wayeseyilungisile kancane
besilokhu sisakhokha ke
sekusele ikhulu nje manje
angithi kwafuneka ukuthi sithenge izitudlwana abantu babe nezinto zokuhlala uma bezosibona
kuyilapho ngeke izenze lutho izindleko zokuthuna
manje indlela efanele ukuhanjwa inde ngempela
kufuneka phela uqale ngebhokisi kungakakhulunywa okunye
nguwena osuzongisiza ngezeluleko
kuthi ke noma nami ngikweluleka kahle ungangizwisisi
izinto zokuhambisa isidumbu nomufi zibiza enye imali
ithree face ibiza r ngaphandle kwezimoto zokunihambisa nayo
wyiswa awu kungcono uma kanti zingabizi kangako
umuntu angazama ukuthi avalavale kungabonakali ukuthi besingenawo umshwalense
bese kubakhona imbuya engu r ngaphandle kwezimoto njalo
enye futhi into ukuthi ubekuphethe kahle kakhulu umntanomuntu
ubengiphethe kahle umntakangubane
futhi angifune kuvelayo ngoba ngilahlekelwe
umuntu uba nothando iwempela empilweni kanye nje vo
angikholwa ukuthi ungaba nothando kabili kathathu
ngakho ke ntombi ufanele ungcwabe indoda yakho ngebhokisi elifanele impatho yakhe enhle
njengoba usushilo ukuthi awunakumngcwa ba futhi kunjalo
kodwa ke ngane yakwethu angifuni neze neze mina ukuthi ngikukhohlise
awukwazi vuyiswa ukuthi uthi wazi kahle ukuthi umyeni wakho bekungumuntu ohlonishwa kangaka uthi uzomngcwaba nge three face
ngabe usho ukuthi ukhona umuntu ozozidelela umuzi kangubane anginike ikhulu ililodwa leli athi ngivale lapho ngimncane khona
ake usho ukuthi abantu bangathini umhlonishwa ofana nongubane engcwatshwa ngebhokisi le three face
mhlawumbe wena uchazwa yigama leli lesingisi
wena uhola r ngenyanga
abelungu bakho bayazi ukuthi ufelwe
nakanja ni bazokunika imali yakho iphelele noma inyanga ingakapheli nje
yithi ngibhale kahle izinto ezifunekayo bese ngicabanga ukuthi kuzofuneka malini uyithole kanjani futhi
vuyiswa kulungile lethiwe qhubeka
indoda yami ibingaphuzi ngisho namahewu odwa lana kodwa yabulawa isidakwa
ngibuye ngithenge utshwala
konke kwadalwa ngumdali ukuthi kuyokwenzeka ngane yakwethu
kube kuhle wafika nawe sikwazi ukucebisana ngoba mina anginazihlobo lapha
nomalume owasala uma befa abasekhayakomama ungumuntu ozihluphekelayo
ukhona ubaba wethu sonke owasidalayo
uzofiblwa nje umfowethu njengabo bonke abantu
mina anginalo ulwazi ngemingcwabo
into futhi ukuthi sasingakawuthathi nomshwalense nkosi yami
ngisengxakini enkulu nxa ngilapha
vuyiswa cha lethiwe sizokulinda nje uze ubuye
nami ngizohlalahlala ngoba izingane kazikho
kufuneka uthole noma ngabe umdokwe nje mntakwethu ukuze ube namandla
phela ukushiywa igazi lakho akusiyona into encane
mntakwethu bamba umoya nje kuphela
thatha thatha libe linye okungenani
angifuni ukuthi uwiswe yindlala
awuboni ke ngane yakwethu
akusikho ukuthi kufanele kukhalwe njalo
kuyaye kufuneke siduduzane ukuze umuntu angaguli ngenxa yosizi
mina yilokhu ngihlalele ukumthethisa umntwana wabantu sengikhohliwe nokuthi angikamenzeli ngisho netiye leli
abantu bazongena khona manje singakenzi lutho
sizobuye sixoxe ke ngakho
ngigcine ngithe ngizayolanda imali yakho emsebenzini wakho vuyiswa
imifino ibe ngu r izinkuni namalahle kungaba ngu r
angazi noma unalo yini itshali elingcono kunaleli
phela  l r akunakubukeka umfazi womuntu obehlonishwa embathe itshali elinjena
ngaphandle kwelincane lokuhamba
kuzofuneka kuthengwe elinye
kodwa uma kuyilezo angiboni ukuthi ungazifaka uma ukulesisimo
umbathe izinto ezihloniphekile
awu ngacishe ngakhohlwa
kufuneka imali yokuqasha amabhodwe okupheka
ithende nezitulo u r mhlawumbe ingaba ngaphezulu
ngisalalele umngani wakho
nami ngizokuza nokwami
ukhumbule ukuthi sike saba nezingxaki zokugulelwa umntwana lona omnca ne
bekungemnandi ekhaya lethiwe
mina ngisesekhaya kulamalanga
bese ngimthathaphi ke u r
bese ngikhohlwe yilokhu
lena eyami ngayithenga ekufeni kukazodwa umntanami wokuqala engangimthanda kakhulu
lwazi bese iba yimalini yona lethiwe
awu mhlawumbe ngiyaphosisa ukubuza bandla
mina lwazi anginayo yonke lemali ezokhokhela lezizinto ezibalwa ngulethiwe
into ongayazi wena kulengxaki yami lwazi ukuthi imali yomshwalense sasingakaqali ukuyikhokha
umyeni wami bekungesiyena unontandakubukwa
mina ngikubalele izinto ezisetshenziswayo kulezinsuku
wena ke musa ukuthanda ukuzenza inhlekisa elokishini sengathi uvela emaphandleni
ngakho ke ngabe siyamyekela ake akhiphe okusemoyeni wakhe ngafuna ukukwenzela umyeni wakhe
imali engaka bandla uyinkosikazi
lendaba iyangehlula lwazi musa ukukhala vuyiswa
zizolunga izinto ngane yakwethu
mina ngolwazi lami ibhokisi leli okuthiwa i open face elinesivalo sengilazi libiza u r
kubekhona ibhokisinalo futhi okuthiwa yiyo i open face elinesivalo ongathi izitebhisi ezintathu
wyiswa mina bakwethu isifiso sami bekungukuthi lemadlana enginayo ngiyisebenzise ngendlela
kodwa ke khumbula ukuthi nguwe manje indoda kulomuzi
khula ke manje unqume ofuna ukukwenza ungalokhu uziba ngobumpofu
ngeke ngane yakwethu ungakhali kangaka ungizwisa ubuhlungu
mhlawumbe ngeke sibone lamahlazo esiyaye siwabone sekuliwa khona emngcwabeni wabantu ngisho nabahloniphekile
hleze sibe nomngcwabo ongenaso lesisiqalekiso esingutshwala
noma bangangihleka bakhulume abakhulumayo ngeke ngibuthenge utshwala
nabazofika ngizobatshela lokho
into engiyomenzela yona ngiyombekela itshe eliyoba isikhumbuzo kimi njalo nxa ngisaphila
into ngiyabonga ukuthi ungafuni ukungena ezingxakini ezinzima emva komngcwabo
futhi siyazi ukuthi nobabili beningenabazali
nakbu okuncane okuvela kumndeni wami
usuqale nini manje ukucela ukudla kanjena
ukulethe ke ngilambe kabi
ngizomenzela ngani uyise itiye ngoba ubisi kufanele lubuye naye
ukudla akukho angiphekile namhlanje
ingane encane kangaka uyithumeleni esitolo emini ubona ukuthi izowela imigwaqo
ngimbona elinile angisho nokuthi ungibonile ukuthi ngingubani
ngoba nina phela aniphumi nje
nangu rothoko mucane nothabethe ungathi akahlali nje la ekhaya
ufika manje nje uthi angimnike ukudla ayolala
ngiyamtshela mina ngithi ukudla angikulungisile nangu nothoko akasabuyi esitolo
usebhoka ke ngokuthi ngiyithumelani ingane esitolo incane kangaka ngoba izoshayiswa zimoto
usuke la wayongena ekamelweni kwasengathi uyalala njengokusho kwakhe
nakhu ke esebuya masinyane futhi ethi ufuna ukudla
mamthembu njengoba umbonile nje
ngiyabona nje kukhona okwakhe okumphambayo
uyangixaka uthabethe uyaqala ukwenza lento
ukhona umuntu ongahamba ngamasokisi ehamba edavuza izwe lonke leli
abantu bazothini nje la bembona khona
ngingenzani nje kodwa dade
ulethe nezicathulo okungenani uziphonse ngewindi lemoto
namhlanje wiqiqi sekungyena othi ingane ithunyelwani esitolo
ubengeke athi umuntu ezigxmela engena emotweni nami ngibe ngiphuma ngintantatheka ngimlandel 
ngimane ngakhexa umlomo nje
ngiqale ngamangazwa ukugena kwakhe ubaba kathoko wangena egijima rlje engazazi nokthi ungubani wakhala ngokudla
into angakaze arenze leyo
uyisusa nje engishalazela ubaba kathoko sengiyibonile mina imoto ukuthi ibaqakile
awuboni ngani ukuthi mhlawumbe kunengane ayishayisile
wangisanganisa ikhanda
ngilizwa lingqangqazela uma usho njalo
kungenzeka ukuba umshayise lowo amshayisile wabaleka mhlawumbe ngenxa yokwethuka
uthe angafika la ekhaya ezwe ukuthi uthoko akekho wasangana kakhulu wafuna ukuyobona noma akusiyena yini lona amshayisile
mamthembu ewu kodwa nkosi yami ngoba into enjalo ingenzeka ngempela
ingabe ubengenwe yini ubaba kathoko
ubejahe ukuzolala nokudla
angaze abulale ingane yami
uyibulele phela akubuzwa uyibulele
ingane yami ifile la ikhona
ngisoliswa ukwenza kukathabethe
sengiyabona ukuthi ubenziswa yini kanjeyana ngizwa nasegazini igazi lami liyangishiya ingane yami isebunzimeni lapho ikhona
ubeqala ukwenza kanjena uthabethe futhi ungixakile impela
yini kumphathe kabi ukuthunywa esitolo kukathoko
angithi ulusizi ungazi lutho
kangakanani ke ukuba bekukhona akutshela khona ubaba kathoko uma ngempela kukhona okwenzekile
kodwa hheyi uyayigijimisa imoto
ngihlale  ngimbuza ukuthi ujaheni
ngimkhuze lutho ukulalela
uzoyeka nje okwesikhashana emva kwesikhathi uzobe eseqala ke futhi
uma isigemegeme sesidlulile umuntu uye azitshele ukuthi ngeke sisenzeka kwakuyiphutha
ukhona umuntu ongavele athume ingane nje eyibona ukuthi ithunyiwe aphinde lapho ayihlalise phansi futhi
ngizothi ngisuka ngibe ngithi ayingathunywa lengane bese kuba sengathi umuntu unonya
nomusa hhayi ungayenzi leyonto kuqondanile nje kwaqondana kabi nokwethuka kwethu
umqondo wami ucubungule ngokushesha
ngisusile ngahlanganisa kulokhu obukusho
kodwa he e iyangixaka mina lendaba
asimlinde sizwe ukuthi uzothini
nami ngimangele impela
nalenkinga yakhe izoqaqeka ngakho ukufika kwakhe
mhlawumbe ushayisa nje yikho ukubalekela amaphoyisa
ngempela ubalekela amaphoyisa uthabethe
ukucela kwakhe ukudla nokufuna ukulala into angejwayele nje ukuyenza ubekwenzela ukuvala mina nje
angeke uze umazi umuntu
omunye umuntu ungena enkingeni yezikweletu lutho ukukutshela
mhlawumbe usuke ethenge into akufihlele yona bese esaba ke ukukutshela ngesikweletu
ungezwa kuthiwa indoda yakho isifile izibulele uxakwe nje
nakhu nje sesiwubonile la uhamba khona
okokuqala obekusixaka sesikubambile sekusele lokhu kwesibili
ngoba akusilona iphupho nakhu isemini mhlawumbe umlingo ngempela
uma ngabe indoda yakho owashada nayo uyazi kahle kamhlophe izokwenza izinto eziyingqayizivele njengalena nje angeke saphika ukuthi ingumenzi wemilingo
uthathe noqhomfane efrijini
mamthembu cha kulungile ntombi yami
ngisho nangesi khathi singakashadi isikhathi ke ekuye kuthiwe abantu bathandana kakhulu ngaso ubengangitsheli lutho oluningi bengize ngizibuzele mina
angisaphathi ke manje uphuma angene nje
angithi phela amadoda azi ukuthi uma senishadile awuselutho isingakuphatha nje noma ikanjani ngoba angeke uhambe
nxa beseslela ancenge ancenge umuntu ungakhohlwa wena ucabanga ukuthi kuyohlala kunjalo kanti lutho
uyileyonblobo ke uthabethe
angeke phela wamguqula umuntu kulokho ayikhona
kodwa phela nawe kufanele uzame ukumnswinya akwaziwa okwanonophalisa ingulube
uzame nje ngazo zonke izindlela kungase kulunge iqonde indoda
uma uthanda uyasuka lapho uphuma eyakho ngeke uhlupeke
umuntu onjengawe nje sisi ngeke ahlupheka ngisho angehlukana nendoda yakhe
baningi kabi abehlukana nawo la emnyango kuyahlanganwa nje kuxoxwe kube mnandi konke iqhubeke kamnandi impilo
uma indoda uyibeka eceleni iyona futhi ezisola kuqala kamuva iyona ehlupheka kakhulu
futhi ke sisi nangaphandle nje kwalokho ungasebenzisa ezinye izindlela zokunswinya uma lokho kungahambi ngendlela oyifunayo
uyabona ke sengizomkhuza okokugcina manje uthabethe ngimeluleke ngalendlela aziphethe ngayo
uzo thi lapho eba nenkani ngiqale ke ngimnswinye
ngoba wena nomusa ungaze ucabange ukuthi ngiyayekelela nje kanti chabo ngihlale ngimkhuza unkabi lo aqhube lobobudoda ke yena
nomusa asazi ke konke kukuwena kuyobe uziyekele
futhi angazi ukuthi bengibanjwe yini sonke lesisikhathi ngingayiboni into okufanele ngiyenze
uyazi uthabethe umuntu wokuvuswa ngempela
uyabona lendlela ashwibeka ngayo njengamanje ithathe ingikbumbuze ngelinye ilanga ngenyanga edlule nje futhi
sasibuya othongathi kwamzala wakhe ubaba kathoko
manje imigwaqo esasihamba kuyona mikhulu ivulekile
engasayigijimisi imoto
kukhona nothoko njalo la emotweni ngiyamtshela ngithi uma kwenzeka ingozi ingane iyona ezolimala kakhulu akucabange lokho
asukeke lapho athi akukho ngane la engalimala uthoko uhleli ngemuva

angigeqi magula is a collection of zulu folklore by laurence tl mabuya
freely translated the title is in a nutshell
nina bakasikithi omnyama
nanku umbangandlala engiwethula kinina
amakhanjana shumpu bakithi
umvumeleni ugodolozi ethi ngowanganeno kwanandi kant ukode kwantombazana
ilang eliphahl elinye ngemisebe kalokhu liphahl elisemthandeni
amazwi mabili engiwabongayo ngibong elikamphandaba nelikandungenkomo bethi uc alohlangan entanyeni izibongo ziwumsebenzi wesinwe ziyiqholo negugu elikhulu lesizwe
futhi zikhombisa ukuphakama kwezinga lomsebenzi wobuciko baleso nalesosizwe nalolo nalolohlanga
indikimba kumbe umnyombo wezibongo yisizwe uqobo lwaso kanti futhi zibhekene ngqo nabantu kumbe amaqhawe asesuke aziveza ubuqhawe bawo ngezindlela ezithile
lokhu kuyakhombisa ukuthi nanxa kuthiwa izibongo zamakhosi akusho ukuthi izibongo azibe zisasabalala zixhantele nakwezinye izingosi zempilo
yikho kanye lokhu okudala ukuba kubongelwe nezilwane kanye nezinto ezingaphiliyo
kubongelwa izinkomo kubongelwe namahhashi kuze kuhayelwe ngisho nezinqola zezimbongolo
khona ke iqiniso yikuthi imvama izibongo zingezamakhosi
uma kuyizibongo zenkosi zisitshela kabanzi mayelana nokubusa kwenkosi zivumbulula amaqiniso obuqhawe nobuvaka baleyonkosi ebusayo
phela imbongi yona yodwa inelungelo elingandele muntu lokukhuluma wonke lawomaqiniso
ezibongweni kukhona amaqiniso ngenkosi uqobo lwayo kanye nesizwe sonkana ngakho ke ziqukethe umlando oqhubekayo wesizwe nenhloko yaso
ubude nobumnandi bezibongo kuvezwa yimpilo yenkosi nezigameko ekuphileni kwayo
esikuphawulayo ukuthi izibongo zingafaniswa nomkhuleko ngoba zihlanganisa abangasekho nalabo abaphilayo
ziyabonga zibongela inkosi impilo ende zicele futhi ziyicelele unwele olude bese zihlanganisa inkosi nesizwe sayo
kuzwakala nxashana imbongi ihaya abantu sebethi hhiya
imbongi kufanele ilwazi usikompilo lwabantu futhi iwazi nomlando wesizwe ebese iba igagu lokuhaya
imbongi iyahlonishwa yikho abafana bekhuthazwa bese bancane ukuba nxa belusile badeze bebongela izinkomo ikakhulukazi izinkunzi zakubo
izibongo ziqala lapho ke
uma imbongi ibonela iyaye isebenzise izifekethiso eziningi ukuze umsebenzi wayo ungabi sangxoxo yemihla namalanga eyisidadada nje
okunye ukuphakama kuvezwa yizifekethiso ezilandelayo  isifaniso if anamsindo if unzankamisa impindamqondo ihaba isingathekiso
abanye bayaye baxakeke ukuthi konje kanti izibongo lezi imbongi isuke izithathephi
izibongo ziwumsebenzi wembongi siqu sayo kakho ohlala phansi ayitshele ukuthi kayothini nce izibongo zayo zibe newozawoza kubantu
ukubonga lokhu kuhambisana namandla ogqozi oluqubuka lushuqungane emizweleni yayo imbongi ebese ke eluphumesa lolugqozi ngezibongo
uma imbongi isisemandleni okubongela ayibe isaba yiloyomuntu esimaziyo isuke isihamba emhlabeni wayo yodwa isimunye namathongo ohlanga okuyiwona aphemba lomlilo kuyona
ithi lapho sekuyisukile imbongi ingabe isama ndawonye kepha idimede izulazula inyakazisa umzimba yehla yenyuka
ndawondawo uyaye uzwe imbongi igcizelela okuthile noma iphindaphinde okuthile noma isho okuthile ngokudazuluka sengathi iphotha intambo ende ebheke ezulwini
konke lokhu kukhombisa amazinga ehlukene imbongi ezama ukuwachachisa ekubongeni kwayo
ngenxa yokuthi izibongo ziwumlando ohambisana nesikhathi kuyenzeka imbongi ithatheke ngangokuthi izosebenzisa amagama athile angasava mile kubantu balesosikhathi
ngakho lokhu kudala ukuba ulimi lwezibongo lushube kakhulu kunolimi lwezinkondlo
sengathi lesisigaba senzelwe ukuba abantu bathule balalele ngoba inkosi yohlanga iyahlonishwa
lokhu kuwukubalungiselela ukuba kube khona umoya wenhlonipho nesizotha ngaphambi kokuba imbongi iqale umsebenzi wayo
futhi ke kuwukubingelela inkosi njengoba basuke beyibona okokuqala ngalesosikhathi kade phela ingakafiki kumbe ihlezi ngakwenye indlu kulindelwe ukuba abantu baqoqane baqede
bambiz emthandeni beyisela bathi singesinelane nentungwa lasenhla kanti uzawudl uphakathwayo empindelweni
uvumavumane lukaphephe  udlungwana wavuma na
umvumeleni ugodolozi ethi ngowanganeno kwanandi kant ukude kwantombazana
ilanga eliphahl elinye ngemisebe so kalokhu liphahl elisemthandeni
odabule kundima nomgovu  abafaz abenendeni baphuluza imikhubulo bayishiy izinqindi imbewu bayishiya semahlangeni izalukazi zasala semanxiweni amaxhegu asala semizileni iziqu zemithi zabheka phezulu
odabule kubhuzane phezulu wakhethelwa udwendwe lwamaza wadlula kumcombo zigoduka
ondlela bazibuza kudunjwa kanti angabazibuza kumbozane yen aphang ukuya kunomagaga lafik iqhude lamvimbela
ngabadala bodwa abazozibalekela  udunjwa yedwa limkhandanisile
oye wakh amaxhib othukela lapho kucushw isilo ngomwowane  weza nokhungwayo ngongobizembe
ondande ngankalo wabuya ngankalo  eya ngobhoyiya kamdakoda undab ubengababele kuya wayeland umacingwane wasengonyameni
okhangel ezansi namadungela izinkomo zabuya zikasihayo  kwaye kwalandel ezikamafongosi ezazisengwa indiki yakwamavela
mgengi phez izitha kusehlobo utshani bude buzokugibanisa
inkonyan ekhwele phezu kwendlu kwantombazi bathi iyahlola  kant ibona bezaz ukuhlola
indlov ethe imuka babeyilandel abakwalanga ibuyis inhloko yandl amadoda
ocel ugwayi kumacingwan engonyameni umacingwane wawulandula  wawuzikholisile usineke suduka lapha kumacingwane kunsukwan abantu ubabangel uxhuxhu nabasezitheni nabasekhaya
ugijime ngazo zonk izindlela  ezingagijimanga eziyakuziwedu uziwedu ngambon esangweni
owahlab esengwayo zand ukwaluka othandayo ahl amzel ekhaya
kuba sengathi ngibuk isihlahla somdlebe
igwija likamdlaka ligwegwe lijez abasini bengoma  undaba uludud emanxulumeni
ugungubele njengolwandle lona kuze kuse lugubelana isidlangudlangu esinjengendlebe yendlovu ongangencumbe yamabel engadliwa  ongangembiza yamashongololo
siyadla sidlondlobele sibek isihlang emadolweni
owadl izinkomo zempathiso okunamini lokhu usaphathekile

ubumnandi obukhulu budalwa yikuba abadlali bangasheshi ukuyivumbulula leyonkinga
futhi njengezaga iziphicaphicwano zisukela ekuhlakanipheni nasebungcwetini bokwakha inkinga ngento esobala nejwayelekile kepha okuthi nxa isiyimpicabadala iphenduke ibe yintshikantshikane engatholakali kalula
iziphicaphicwano zisakuqagelisa umuntu impendulo yalokho okwaziwa ngomunye abese ekubeka ekuhlobisa ekucashisa kuze kungabe kusaba sobala kakhulu
iqhinga elivamile lokucashisa umqondo wesiphicaphicwano ukuba kusetshenziswe isithombe esiyindida

into engasho lutho nenganakokile iphenduka ibe ngumfana wami esiphicaphicwaneni
yikho kanye lokhu okudala ukuba kube khona ukucashelana okonomphelo eziphicaphicwaneni
incazelo yesiphicaphicwano ingaba igama elilodwa noma ibe intambo ende echaza izigaba eziningi zesiphicaphicwano
lokhu kucaca kahle esiphicaphicwaneni esingenhla esiphathelene nempilo yomuntu
nakuba iziphicaphicwano zibukeka njengomdlalo wasendulo owawudlalwa zingane akusho lokho ukuthi yizo zodwa izingane ezaziba ngabadlali
njengoba sichazile ekuqaleni zona zehluke kwominye imisebenzi yesinwe ngokuthi zazidlalwa yiwo wonke umudeni kuze kube sengathi ziyisibhamba esihlanganisa umudeni wonke
abantu yibo ababesungula iziphicaphicwano bese beqagelisana izimpendulo
imvelo yiyo kanye esiza ukuba abantu bakitazeke ezingqondweni bese kubhoboka umthombo wempicabadala
kuhle silibhekisise igama elithi impicabadala ngoba yilo qho elisichazela ukuthi abancane nabo bebenegunya lokuphica abadala
bajabule ke nabo bebona ukuthi mamo ayingangamlomo
kunendlela elandelwayo lapho kudlalwa iziphicaphicwano
abadlali bahleleka ngendlela yokuba kube khona igosa nabadlali abanye
kuqala lapho ke ukuba abadlali bese beshabasheka befuna ukusho impendulo
kepha akekho oyishoyo impendulo engakakhonjwa yigosa

uma sebehluleke bonke kuye kuthiwe siyathengwa sithengwa ngokuba igosa lizisholo lona impendulo
bese linikeza omunye ithuba lokuba abe yigosa naye

impela kuliqiniso ukuthi isitsha esihle asidleli bengikwethemba kakhulu mntanami ngithi uyoba yinqaba yethu yokuphephela nxa sesigugile hhawu yehheni bantu
awungiboni ukuthi nginjani
ngithathela iziqhaza umsebenzi kanti zona sezizosebenzani
ngeke ngikwenze lokho sekungafane kube yini kabe kanye  kanti udolly ukhuluma yedwa nje nangu omunye umfundimhlengikazi umile lapha ngemova kwakhe uyamuzwa ekhuluma yedwa usemangele nje ukuthi ngabe udolly ungenwe yini hhawu
inkomo ingazala umuntu
hamba uyomfuna uze naye lapha nxa ningafika sengihamble lapha ewodini umtshele eze ehhovisi lami  waphuma wayomcinga edanilomu ngoba kwabe sekuyisikhathi sokuphunga itiye wamswela lapho wabe eseyomcinga ehhositela wamthola ecambalele embhedeni wakhe engazi nje nokuthi liphele kuphi hhawu we dolly wacambalala
woza sihambe usister uyakubiza  yayizazi lentokazi ingancengi nkobe zamuntu ngoba kwabo kwakusuthwa athi esangena nje emnyango ufikile amudle luhlaza mina lapha wena dolly wedeleliswa yini
umama yena angafa nokofa  yiya
ungenqeni wena ngizolungisa yonke into ngemuva kokaba sesishadile enkantolo amalobolo kanye nomshado yizinto ezincane lapha kimi nginemali yami mina angenqeni lutho   yebo ngiyazi ukuthi imali yona unayo pho 
uqalelani ti ngokugcinwa ngakho
akulungansa kwethu ngoba indlu yincane izingane zakwethu ziningi kakhulu okwesibili umama loya akasiyena umama ongizalayo akangithandi neze
ngakho ke ngeke wahlala kahle khona manje sizothi singashada enkantolo bese siya kwamasipala ehhovisi siyofuna indlu nxa sesiyitholile bese silungisela umgidi womshado ungakhathazeki wena ngizozenza zonke izimfanelo ngizolobola bese ngenza amalungiselelo omshado ngaleyondlela othanda ngayo ayitho into ezongehlula ngoba imali nginayo nxa unemali unezinto zonke  yebo ngiyakazwajohn ukhuluma kahle uma ngabe uzozifeza lezozithembiso zakho  fikile ngithembe ngiyafunga ukuthi izithembiso zami ngizozifeza  sebezwene ngenkulumo basukama bangena emotweni babheka egoli abazange besachitha isikhathi bathi befika nje babeqonda enkantolo yemishado okuthiwa yisipesheli basuka lapho baya epimville kubo kajohn bafika khona abakwabo bephelele bonke ekhaya bahlala ke kwatatazelwa kwenziwa itiye kwenzelwa ufikile naye esehlezi ethe khoso egumbini laphaya ezolile njengomakoti impela usesuka ujohn eyoluma unina indlebe ngohambo iwabo mama sengenze icala lapha kusho ujohn hhawu
waze wasilaya matanami wasingenisela icala ekhaya ngiyamzwela unina walengane ngizwa kuska km esswini sengathi ngumatanami maye ukazala ngesinye isikahthi kungusathane
kulele kunye ukaba kabili ngabe kuyavusana uyazi shadisa fikile ngaphandle kwabazali
lapho umamsibi usephefumula kanzima impela sekobonakala ukuthi sezihuba sakusha wezwakala ephefumula kakhulu edonsa umoya sengathi sekuphuma umpefumulo avake ahlale ngezinqe ababheke bonke emehlweni abese eqhweba umakhumalo athi akambambe ocabangweni enze njalo athi angambamba athole amandla akhulume ake ake ningi phu zise amanzi  usho ngezwi elithuthumelayo umakhumalo athathe indebe eyabe inamanzi ibekwe phezu kwetaeula amnike ayishayele phezalu angi kholwanga  baphinde bamphuzise amanye futhi nawo awashayele ekhanda sengathi indebe iyavuza kuqale ukuthi dwe kancane engqondwem hhawu
impela kunjalo ngcobo umuntu ozibiza ngokuthi ulikholwa wohlelwa yizigigaba ezinzima unkulunkulu usuke ekulinga efuna ukokabona ukuthi ukholo iwakho lungakanani yiso ke isikhathi sokuzibonakalisa ubuqotho nokuthembela kunkulunkulu musa usabe usakhalela umamsibi yena useziphumulele ezinkathazweni zakulomhlaba zikhalele wena osasele ezinhluphekweni nasebunzimeni bakulomhlaba  yebo mankashela selidume ledlula langishiya mina engabe lingithathile ngizoba yini mina
mtshele angene  aphume afike amtshele ujohn ukuthi uthi usister akangene nempela ke angqongqothe qede bese engena hhawu
njengoba kunjenje kungenxa yami nawe unembeza uyangidla angilali nasebusuku sekukabili ngiphupha umama efika kimi engikhombisa inhliziyo yakhe ibomvu yigazi athi kimina kunjenje kungenxa yami manje ke sengesaba nokuhlangana nobaba awu he

yindodakwakusho amakhehla emi budebuduze nenxuluma lasentendeni ebuka ubuhle balo kanti ke nodlula ngendlela wayesho njalo lapho ebuka iziqikili zezinkomo ziklabe ezansi komuzi ilanga seliyoshona

zazingaqambi manga izibongo zalensizwa zikhomba ngempela ubuqhawe bayo

kwaze kwaba intambama izinsizwa lezi zihlezi lapha emfuleni zilokhu zifakana imilomo
seliya ngomtsha wendoda zabonakala zikhuphuka emfuleni zahamba zaze zayongena ehlanzeni zaqonda khona emagxalabeni emzini wakwaximba
umuzi wasemagxalabeni kwaximba wawakhe ngaphansi kwesibi isiwa lesi owawungathi uma uke wakhalakathela kuso ufike phansi laphaya sewubanda
ukwesabeka kwaso lesisiwa kwawenza nawo umuzi lona wasabeka kwabasengathi uma ungake uhlwelwe bese uyokhuleka kuloyamuzi kungasa ubheke ngawayizolo ulalele abakhunkuli begidisa imikhovu yabo
ngezansi komuzi lona wawubona nje ihlanze lendlaleke njalo kuze kuyofika kude lena lapho amehlo enqundeka khona
kwakungelula ukuwuhlasela lomuzi wakwaximba ngoba wawungathi usenqabeningenhla kwawo kuyisiwa ngezansi khona kuyihlanze
konke lokhu kwawenza wacasha uthole ukuthi akulula ukuwubona uma ungawazi
indlela eyayiqhamuka ngenhta yayicaca phezu kwesiwa lesi ithambeke njalo phakathi kwamatshe amakhulu nezihlakta ize iyothi cababa ezansi laphaya ngasegcekeni
indlela eqhamuka ngezansi yona yayithubeleza phakathi ehlanzeni ize iyothi thushu laphaya ngezansi kwesibaya
lmuva kwesikhashana lashona itanga kwafka ukuhtwa kwabamnyama
ingubo yobumnyama yateleka iltanze yaligubuzela akwabe kusabonakala lutho konke kwafihteka
ukufihla kobumnyama kwabanjengakho ukufihta kwehtanze leli elalifihte imizi yamadoda izilwane zasendle izinyoni zezulu nezigigaba ezazehtakala phakathi kwalo imihla ngemihla
yayibuthisa impi  ehlanzeni lapha ziyaqambe ziyafka izitha sezizithela phezu kwamabutho engangotshani

abanye abasebenzi besikole ngeke nabo sibayeke
ukugula kuphazamisa ukufunda nokufundisa
othisha abaphilile bophoqeleka ukuthwala okuthe xaxa uma othisha abagulayo bengekho
abafundi abagulayo bosalela emuva nezifundo zabo
uma amalunga omndeni egula noma efa othisha nabafundi bayezwela
nxa othisha nabafundi befa izikole ziyathikamezeka zilahlekelwe futhi zizwe nosizi
izikole eziningi zizokhinyabezwa yisankahlo sesifo kothisha kubafundi nasemindenini
yini engenziwa yizakhamizi zaseningizimu afrika
inkinga ibonakala sengathi iyasigubuzela kodwa singaqala ukwenza izaba
masisebenza sihlangene singasithiba lesisifo bese sibhekana ngqo nemiphumela yaso

nazi izifundo okufuneka sizifunde kulokho asebedlule kukho  ngaphandle kokuba sithathe izinyathelo ezidingekayo zokuzivikela noma ngubani kithina angaphathwa yisandulela ngculazi
othisha bangakwazi futhi kufuneka basize ukuvimba lesifo nokubhekana nemiphumela yaso  othisha kufuneka babeyisibonelo sokuziphatha kahle makuyiwa ocansini
othisha besilisa baneqhaza elibalulekile  kufuneka uuphele lomkhuba wothisha besilisa wokuthi bafune ucanci ngoshova emantombazaneni esikole noma kothisha besifazane
isiphetho  lencwajana izokusiza ikuhlomise ukuthi ubeneqhaza ozolibamba emzabalazweni wokulwa nesandulela ngculazi nasevikeleni ikusasa elicwebezelayo lalesizukulwane kanye nesizayo
sicela uyifunde bese uxoxa ngayo ekhaya kozakwenu esikoleni emikhandlwini elawula izikole nabafundi bakho ezikhungweni zenu zkukhonza emaqenjini ezemidlalo kanye nakuphi nihlangana ndawonye emphakathini

lokhu kubizwa ngokuthi yi window period
uma sihlola igazi sifuna ukuthi isandulela ngculazi sesikhona na ngesithuba se window period umphumela uyothi lomuntu akanalo igciwane yizo noma sinalo
kufuneka siziphathe njengabantu abangangenwa yigciwane noma abangase bathelele abanye ngalo bese sizivikela thina uqobo kanye nabanye kulengozi
ama antibodies akhombisa ukuthi umzimba unezimpawu zokulwa nokubakhona kwegciwane lesandulela ngculazi nokuthi umzimba uzama ukuzivikela
futhi kuhle kakhulu ukuthi utshele ilunga lomndeni eliseduze kwakho noma ngumngani ozokuxhasa

ngebhadi ayive ibiza imba eqolo

zonke lezizimo zikhona zonke eningizimu afrika
ngo  lokuhlola kwaveza ukuthi amaphesenti angu  entsha ekhulelwe amaphesenti angu  abafazi abakhulelwe abaneminyaka ephakathi kwa  kanye no  kanti amaphesenti angu  wabafazi abaneminyaka engu  eya ku  anegciwane lesandulela ngculazi
iningi lethu linakekela izihlobo ezigulayo
iningi lethu liyazi ukuthi nathi uqobo lwethu sesinalo leligciwane lesandulela ngculazi
abaningi bayongenwa yileligciwane emuva kokuqeda esikoleni ngaphandle uma sebesiziwe ukuba bathathe izindlela eziphephile zocanci
ubuholi buqala ekhaya othisha babhekeke ukuba ngabantu okubukelwa kubona izinto ezinhle futhi babengabaholi emphakathini
yana ocansini ngendlela ephephile  iningi lokungenwa yigciwane lesandulela ngculazi kwenzeka ngesikhathi kuyiwa ocansini
ukuze sivimbele ukungena kwegciwane lesandulela ngculazi kufuneka sisebenzise izindlela zocansi eziphephe ngokuthe xaxa
onukubeziwe kufuneka athathwe masishane ayiswe kudokotela wesifunda noma kwisikhungo sezempilo ayohlolwa athole ukuyalwa kanye nokusheshayo okuvimbela ukukhulelwa
ukudlwengulwa kumele kubikwe emaphoyiseni bese kuthi onukubeziwe acelwe ukuba abhale isitatimende
alikabibikho ikhambi lesandulela ngculazi
kukhona ezinye izinhlobo zokuthinta ezenza bangakhululeki
ukusebenzisa ikhondomu kuzokuvikela ezifweni zocansi ezithathelwanayo ukungazali kanye nasekukhulelweni okungadingekile  izifo zocansi ezithathelwanayo zidala isilonda emthondweni noma ngasekugeneni engquthwini noma ubomvu noma ubuhlungu uma uchama

ungalokothi uye ocansini uma unezifo ezithathelwanayo ngokocansi

iyona ndlela eyenza ukuthi angapheli

uhlelo oluqinile futhi olucacile alukaze ludingeke njengoba ludingeka njengoba ludingeka namuhla

ukuzwana okuhle mayelana nezocansi akuthintene namandla okuphatha
akuphathelene nokufuna amaalungelo
wona aphathelene nokuthi nijabulisane futhi nihloniphane nobabili
umthethosisekelo ubhekela kahle kakhulu amalungelo abantwana
lokho kuzwana asabalulekile kakhulu namanje kubantu abasebasha
abaningi abantu abasha bacabanga ukuthi baphephile bona ngoba basebancane
bangacabanga ukuthi kuwubunsizwa ukungena engozini beyibhekile
ukumane sitshele abantu abasha ukuthi mabangayi ocansini akwenele njengempendulo noma kodwa kona kuyingxenye yempendulo
umashayabhuqe wesandulela ngculazinengculazi usikhombisa ukuthi sibhekene nenkinga yokuziphatha kahle uma abantu bezwana ezweni lakithi
kufuneka sifundise abantwana bethu kanye nabasha bethu ukuzihlonipha bona uqobo nokuthi bahloniphe ontanga babo bakhombise ukuqonda okunzulu kwamalungelo amantombazane nabafazi bahlanganyele ndawonye nomphakathi beyimbumba ukuze kusindiswa thina uqobo kanye nabo
ama ngo ezenza loluhlobo lomsebenzi kufuneka zemukelwe ezikolweni zethu futhi zigqugquzelwe ukuzosiza
amaphepha imisakazo nokunye kugcwele izindaba ngalomashayabhuqe wesifo
izingane ziyalusabalalisa ulwazi ngalesifo phakathi kwazo noma ngabe luyiqiniso noma alusilona
ukulahlwa kwamathawula awesikhathi kanye namathemponi  sonke isikole kufuneka siqiniseke ukuthi kunohlelo lokulahlwa kwamathawula asesikhathini kanye namathemponi
bonke othisha nabafundi besifazane kufuneka bazi ngalezi zinhlelo ukuze omunye umuntu angathintani nalezi zinto
kufuneka anxuswe ukuba angagezi noma ashintshe izingubo zakhe 
kufuneka athathwe ayiswe kudokotela wesifunda masishane noma kwisikhungo sezempilo ukuze atholwe ukuxilongwa kanye nokuvimbela ukuzala okuphuthumayo kanye nasemaphoyiseni ukuze abhale isitatimende bese evula necala
amalungiselelo kumele enziwe wokuthi lona wesifazane athole ukududuzwa nokuyalwa ngabangochwepheshe  uma kunokugwazeka noma ukuchaphazeleka kwegazi eselingenwe yigciwane lesandulela ngculazi esisikhumbeni esidabukile kudingeka kunzekwe okosizo lokuqala ngokushesha
ukusebenza kwalemithi kulezizimo akukabi nobufakazi
ayikatholakali ezibhedlela zikahulumeni
loyo osengozini enkulu yokungenwa yigciwane lesandulela ngculazi ebe futhi enemali yokuthenga lemithi angazikhethela ukuyisebenzisa
izinqumo zokusebenzisa lamakhambi kumele zithathwe ngokushesha njengoba kucatshangwa ukuthi asebenza kakhulu uma esheshe asetshenziswa emva kwesigigaba

kuthiwani ngezinye izifo
noma ngubani ongaba ne tb kufuneka elulekwe ukuba athole ukwelashwa masinyane bese ebuyela esikoleni noma esikhungweni uma nje esethole ukwelulekwa ngudokotela
ukuza kwabo esikoleni kuyophazamiseka bese futhi bangakwazi ukulalelisisa bese besalela emuva ngomsebenzi wabo

lapho kunokwenzeka khona ukuvakashela amakhaya kufuneka kuhlelwe yisikole
indlela engcono kakhulu esebenzayo yokwehlisa izingozi ezinje ukuthi wabelane ngolwazi oluqukethwe kulencwadi kanye nabafundi ukuze baqonde wonke amaqiniso avela kodokotela mayelana negciwane lesandulela ngculazi kanye nokuthi sidluliselwa kanjani kwabanye bese bazi ukuthi bona bangazivikela kanjani kuso
lowo mgomo kufuneka uhambisane nomthethosisekelo kanye nomthetho

leyomibono iyazeka ukuthi ivelaphi
lesidumo senza kubenezinto okufanele sinzenze ezingajwayelekile
iminyaka eminingi sivumele igciwane lazandela kanti lapha ezweni lakithi yilapho linyuka ngezinga eliphakeme kakhulu emhlabeni jikelele njalo nje ngosuku olulodwa abanye futhi abantu abangu  eningizimu afrika bangenwa yileligciwane
ingozi ikhona ngempela abanye abaningi babhekene nengozi yokungenwa yigciwane lesandulela ngculazilengculazi

isigaba  wonke umuntu kumele awathole wonke lamalungelo nenkululeko ebhalwe kulolugunyazo ngale kokwehlukaniswa ngokobuhlanga ngokwebala ngokobulili ngokolimi ngokwenkolo ezombangazwe noma umbono ubuzwe noma imvelaphi umhlaba ukuzalwa noma isiphi ke nje esinye isimo

isigaba  akekho oyoboshwa avelelwe noma adingiswe ngokungekho emthethweni
isigaba  wonke umuntu kumele alalelwe obala ngokulingana okugcwele nangeqiniso inkantolo engavuni futhi ezimele ekutholweni kwamalungelo akhe nezimiselo zakhe noma ngabe iliphi icala abekwe lona

ibukeka kanjani i nqf
imithethonkombiso ye nsb iveza iziqu nezitifiketi zemvume   ziyakumela ukudidiyelwa kwemiphumela yokufunda okuhleliwe okunenhloso emisiwe nokuhloswe ngakho ukuba kuphathiswe umfundi ngekhono lokusebenzisa lokho akufundile ekwenzeni umsebenzi nokuthi kube yisisekelo sokuqhuba izifundo  ukuthayisela isisindo kulomfundi esiyophumelela ngokumnikeza igama okanye isikhundla ukwamukeleka ukwandisa amathuba okudingeka kwekhono lakhe kanye nokuqashwa  nikeza izunzo emphakathini kanye nakwezomnotho  ukugcina lokho okuphokophelwe yi nqf  ukubandakanya kokubili impumelelo embaxambili nempumelelo ethile ukuze kuthuthukiswe ukufunda impilo yonke  uma kufanele siziqathanise nomhlaba  ukubandakanya indlela yokuvivinya ehlanganisiwe ukuze kuqinisekwe ukuthi inhloso yalelezo ziqu noma isitifiketi semvume iyafezeka

ngonyaka ka  i saqa yasabalalisa imithethonkombiso ngomgwamanda obizwa nge national standards bodies lapho wamisa khona amalungiselelo okubhalisa imigwamanda emibili okuyi national standards bodies kanye ne standards generating bodies
lemigwamanda inomthwalo wokukhiqiza futhi yenze izincomo ngeziqu kanye namazinga noma ukubhalisa ne nqf
imithethonkombiso ngesigungu sokuqiniseka ngamazinga emfundo noqeqesho nayo yasakazwa ngonyaka ka  yona yamiselwa ukugunyazwa kwemigwamanda yokuqiniseka ngamazinga emfundo noqeqesho 
yiwaphi amagatsha e saqa futhi ziyini izinhloso zawo
ukumiswa kwamazinga kanye nenqubo yokuqiniseka ngamazinga kulandela imigomo yemfundiso emibili ulwazi olungasentsheziswa kulomhlaba wamanje lwakhiwe ngokubambisana phakathi kwemikhakha eyahlukene emphakathini ukusekela kwabezemfundo abacwaningi kwezamabhizimisi ukusukela kumsebenzi kuya kongoti bolwazi kusuka kuhulumeni kuya ezinhlanganweni zemiphakathi kusukela kubafundi kuya ko solwazi  lokhu kukhomba khona ukuthi ukwakhiwa kolwazi akusagcinelwe bona ongoti kwezolwazi kuphela  uhlelo lwemfundo lukazwelonke lwezemfundo kufanele lulingane nesidingo semfundo esezingeni lazo zonke izakhamuzi kanye nesidingo sokuhlinzekela izimo ezahlukene abafundi abangabhekana nazo mayelana nalokho okwakha imfundo kanye neziqu ezisebenzisekayo lokhu ukuzimazisa phakathi kwezidingo zomphakathi kanye nezidingo zomuntu ngamunye
umgomo wokufundisa wokuqala usufezekile ngamagatsha amiswe yi saqa
i saqa ngokwayo yakhiwe ngabantu abamele labo abathintekayo kwezemfundo noqeqesho eningizimu afrika
amalungu e nsbs nawo ayisibinelo salokhu kubambisana ekwakheni
i nsb yakhiwe ngabamele imigwamanda eyisithupha yabathintekayo kazwelonke kanti igcizelela kakhulu  iminyango kahulumeni ubumbano losomabhizinisi ubumbano lwabezemisebenzi abezemfundo noqeqesho izigungu ezinozwelo kanye nemiphakathi nezinhlangano zabafundi
ngokwendabuko mancane kabi amaqembu kulawa aseke ahlala phansi axoxisana ngezemfundo noqeqesho kulelizwe
ngaphezu kwalokhu amalungu e sgb nawo akhetha emaqenjini athintekayo aphambili kwezemfundo noqeqesho nalapha kuyamukelwa ukuthi ulwazi oludingekayo nolusebenzisekayo lwakhiwa ngokuxoxisana namaqembu amaningi
ukuzinikela kwe nqfs emfundweni noqeqesho olusekelwe phezu kwempumelelo njengendlela yokuletha uguquko ohlelweni lwemfundo noqeqesho eningiizmu afrika kufeza umgomo wokufundisa wesibili
nokuchaza amazinga kanye neziqu kuzwelonke ngokwemiphumela yokufunda ngenqubo yokubamba iqhaza i nqf ibeka ngaphambili izimfuno zikazwelonke zamazinga aphezulu kunalezo
isizwe asisenakusimela manje isimo lapho kukhona amakhono ahlukene phakathi kwalabo bafundi abaneziqu ezifanayo ngenxa yokuthi umqashi akabe esazi ukuthi iliphi ikhono elikhona isizwe asisenakukumela futhi ukubandlululwa kwabafundi ngenxa yezinkolelo ezithile ngamakhono abo
isizwe asinakukumela ukunganaki amazinga kanye neziqu zomhlaba wonke jikelele
kafushane nje imiphumela yokufunda  amazinga kanye neziqu kufanele kucace bha kungabi nakungabaza ngokuthi kungalindelekani kulowo mfundi osethole iziqu
ngokumisa imigwamanda ye education and training quality assurance  i saqa isikwamukele ukuthi ukuletha amazinga kanye neziqu kuyinto okufanele igcinwe ngongoti kanye nabafundi nabanye abathintekayo kulomkhakha
iziqu kanye namazinga ahlukene ziyoletha izimfuno ezahlukene ekuthuthukiseni umgudu nokufeza lokho okufunwayo ukuvivinya kanye nokufundisa
i saqa ayinandaba kakhulu nokuthi nokuqiniseka ukuthi bonke abezemfundo balandela umgomo kodwa inendaba nokuthi abafundi abathweswa iziqu azibhalise ne nqf iziqu noma amazinga bayakwazi ukukhombisa imiphumela yokufunda ngokweziqu noma ngokwezinga elichaziwe noma elimisiwe ku nqf nakuba kunjalo i etqa izoyihlolisisa imigomo yokufunda yabafundisayo abahlukene ngesikhathi bebhaliswa ngalokho bayoqinisekisa abafundi kanye nabanye abasebenzisa uhlelo lwezemfundo ukuthi yinoma imuphi umfundi othathwe njengosephumelele ekuzimbandakanyeni nalomgomo wokufunda  ukuthi ukhombise imiphumela yemfundo edingekayo kulezo ziqu noma lelo zinga
umgwamanda osesimeni esihle ukuqiniseka ngalokhu yilowo owakhiwe ngabamele bonke abathintekayo odabeni lweziqu kanye namazinga okuyakuba yi etqa ebhekele leyo ndawo
amagatsha angaphansi kwaleligatsha lokumisa amazinga kukhona i national standards bodies kanye ne standards generating bodies  kanti amagatshana angaphansi kwegatsha lokuqiniseka ngamazinga umgwamanda we education and training quality assurance etqas
i saqa ingakhetha imigwamanda ezololisisa uma ibona kunesidingo salokhu
imisebenzi ye saqa ibekwe kahle kumthetho we saqa sekukhulunyiwe vele ngayo ngenhla
imisebenzi yemigwamana i nsbs kanye ne sgbs kubekwe kumthethonkombiso emiswe ngaphansi komthetho i south african qualifications authority  nsbs iphephabhuku likahulumeni elingunombolo  kanti inqubo yokugunyaza kanye nemisebenzi ye etqa kanye nabezemfundo noqeqesho khona kubekwe kumthethonkombiso okhishwe ngaphansi komthetho isouth african qualifications authority  etqas iphephabhuku likahulumeni elingunombolo  
ku nqf izifundo zihlelwe zaba zindima eziyishumi nambili 
i saqa isungule imigwamanda ye nsbs eyishumi nambili eyodwa ibhekene nokuhlela indima yayo
ama nsbs wona ngokwawo awakhiqizi amazinga neziqu kodwa engamela imisebenzi ezingeni laleyo ndimana imisebenzi yama sgbs ibandakanya lokhu kulandelayo  ukukhiqiza amazinga neziqu ngokuhambisana nezidingo zesigungu seziphathamandla kuleyo ndimana nakulelo zinga   ukuthuthukisa amazinga ukuze ahambisane nezikhathi kanye nokubukeza amazinga  ukwenza izincomo ku ansb mayelana namazinga neziqu  ukwenza izincomo ngenqubo yokubhalisa abasekeli kanye nabahlolisisi noma imigwamanda yokuhlolisisa i etqa ingasungula emkhakheni wezenhlalakahle umkhakha wezomnotho noma umkhakha wezohlelo lwemfundo noqeqesho
kuyosentshenziswa umgomo wokuphindaphinda okuncane kakhulu ekusungulweni kwe etqas lokhu kusho ukuthi etqa iyogunyazelwa ukuba ibheke lokho eqondene nayo kuphela kususelwa ebudlelwaneni bayo nalowo mkhakha ukuze umsebenzi wayo ungafani noma kuphindaphindeke umsebenzi wenye i etqa esivele ikhona
umsebenzi we etqas uyombandakanya lokhu okulandelayo  ukugunyaza abaletha imfundo  ukuthuthukisa izinga phakathi kwalabo abamelwe  ukuqapha imibandela ukubhekisia abalekeleli nokwenza lula ukuhlolisisa kulabo abamelwe  ukubhalisa abasekeli  ukunikeza abafundi izitifiketi  ukubambisana neminye imigwamanda ehlolisisayo  ukuphakamisa izincomo ku nsb ngamazinga noma iziqu ezintsha noma ukwenziwa ngcono kwalawo mazinga akhona noma lezo ziqu ezikhona  ukugcina imininigwane  ukuhambisa imibiko ku saqa
i etqa yona ayimisi amazinga bona baqiniseka ukuthi kukhiqizwa okuseqophelweni kanye nokucubungululisa amazinga neziqu ezibhalisiwe
ngaphezu kwalokhu i etqa ayisiyo mlethi wemfundofundisayo umsebenzi wayo ophambili nosemqoka ukuqiniseka ngeqophelo lemibandela kanye nokucubungulisisa labo abaletha imfundo abagunyaziwe
kulezizimo i saqa iyakuvumela ukugunyazwa okwesikhashana ngalesisikhathi lowo onikeza ngemfundo kufanele angenele uhlelo lokuthuthukiswa olwenzelwe ukuba lowo mnikeli wemfundo akwazi ukuhlangabezana nezidingo zokugunyazwa
liyogcinwa kanjani iqophelo ekuvivinyeni
i saqa ilubeke lwaqonda ngqo uhlelo olungasentshenziswa ukuhlolisisa kuze kuqinisekwe ukuthi kubhekwa ezinye izindlela ezingalandela esikhundleni saleyo yendabuko yokubhala ukuhlolwa kanye
ngempela ukubuyekezwa kwemiphumela kukhombisa ukungafaneleki kwalendlela yokuhlolisisa lawo makhono
ezinye izindlela zokuvivinyisiswa kuthwesa ubunzima kuloluhlelo ukuze kuqinisekwe ukuthi kunokulunga kanye nokutolika okungaguquki kwamazinga adingekayo kuma etqa ahlukene lokhu kuvikela ukungayiphambili kwamazinga
uma ngabe kusentshenziswa amazinga ahlukene kuloluhlelo ukuthembeka kanye nokuhlonipheka kwaloluhlelo kuyathunazeka
ukuze kuqinisekwe ukuthi lokhu akwenzeki i saqa isimise izindlela zokuqapha eziningi
noma iliphi izinga noma iziqu ezilethwe ku nqf ukuba zibhaliswe kufanele  ibeke kucace inqubo yokuvivinyisisa kwempumelelo yokufunda  ibeke inqubo yokubhaliswa kwabasekeli bemiphumela nokuthi  bakhombise izimo zokuhlolisisa kubandakaywa kanye nezincomo zokuhlolisisa noma umgwamanda wokuhlolisisa imiphumela
ngakho ke  abaphakamisi beziqu namazinga banendima enkulu ekumele bayidlale ekumiseni amazinga angenadinda kanye nezidingo ezihambisana nalokhu
nakhona inqubo yokuqinisekisa ngamazinga kunokugcizelela okukhulu kwenqubo yokuhlolisisa ukuze kube nesiqiniseko ukusentshenziswa kwamazinga kubo bonke abezemfundo
i saqa ingaqiniseka kanjani ukuthi izinqubo migomo zabo ziyamukeleka kulabo abathintekayo kwezemfundo
i saqa ikubeka kucace ukuthi i nqf kufanele imiswe emva kokubonisana kanye nokubambisana nayo yonke imigwamanda kanye nezikhungo ezinomthwalo wezemfundo uqeqesho kanye nokukhipha izitifiketi ngamazinga athintekayo yi nqf
futhi umthetho we saqa usibeka sicace isidingo se saqa sokwenza umsebenzi waso ngomoya wokubambisana kanye nokubonisana kuyinkomba yokuzinikela kukahulumeni omusha wentandoyeningi emgomeni wokumelwa kanye nokubamba iqhaza kwazo zonke izikhungo zomphakathi ezithintekayo
ukugcizelela ekumbandakanyeni kususelwa emlandweni wokushiywa ngaphandle kwemikhakha eminingi yomphakathi ekuthathweni kwezinqumo ngezemfundo noqeqesho
njengesibonelelo amakhono okwakumelwe athuthukiswe kanye nalokho okumele kufundwe esikhathini esedlule kwakenziwa yilabo ababezibiza ngongoti kwezemfundo ngokuvamisile kwakuba ngabafundisi abasezikhungweni zemfundo noma abafundisayo ngale kokubonisana noma ngokubonisana okuncane nalabo abasebenzisa leziziqu njengabamabhizimisi izinyunyana kwezemisebenzi kanye nabafundi
lokhu kwaholelwa ekugxekweni ngokuthi kwakungekho ukuhambisana phakathi kwalokho okwakufundiswa ezikhungweni zemfundo kanye nalokho okudingekayo kwezemisebenzi noma ukuqhuba izifundo
ngaphezu kwalokhu kwakungekho ukubonisana noma ukubambisana phakathi kukangqongqoshe wezemfundo kanye nongqongqoshe wezamandla abasebenzi bakahulumeni owedlule nabezimboni noma abezinkampani noma nombuso phakathi kwabezemfundo kanye nabezoqeqesho
lokhu kwakusho ukuthi akukho ndlela okakungaxhunyaniswa ngayo ukufunda phakathi kwezikhungo zokufunda ngokwazo noma kwezifundo ezazifundwa iziqu zahlala zibhekiswe kulowomkhakha othile kuphela zigcike kuleyondawo noma kuleso sikhungo kungekho noma nokuncane ukuxoxosana phakathi kwezikhungo zokufunda
nakuba sekunesiko lokubonisana nokubambisana ohlelweni lokuthatha izinqumo kuleningizimu afrika entsha isizathu esibalulekile nesizwakalayo ngokumelwa ekuthathweni kwezinqumo mayelana nokuthi kufanele kube yini imiphumela yokufunda noma ukuthola iziqu ezithile  ngokudingeka noma ukusebenziseka
ukuze iningizimu afrika ikwazi ukubhekana naloluguquko kwezemvelo kubalulekile ukulalela wonke amazwi kulomkhakha wezemfundo kahulumeni abafundisayo  abezamabhizimisi abezemisebenzi abalethi bemfundo kanye noqeqesho uma kungabalwa nje abambalwa
inqubo yokubandakanya abanye ekumseni amazinga kanye nokwakha iziqu kuyosiza ekunakekeleni inkombiso entsha ngokushesha okuyokwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi iningizimu afrika nayo iyahambisana neziguquko nentuthuko ezenzekayo emhlabeni wonke
i saqa izinikele enqubeni yokubonisana nomphakathi uma ithuthukisa inqubomgomo kanye nokusenthenziswa kwayo
iziqu kanye namazinga kudingeka ukuba zidlule kwinqubo yokubonisana nabathintekayo kulendima kanye nokubonisana okubanzi lapho umphakathi wonkana uyonikezwa ithuba lokubuyekeza bese wenza iziphakamiso ngalawo mazinga ahlongozwayo
ngaphezu kwalokho zonke iziqu kanye namazinga ayohanjiswa ku reference group eyakhiwe yizinhlangano ezimele abakhubazekile kanye nalowo mkhakha womphakathi obushiwe ngaphandle ukuze benze iziphakamiso ngaphambi kokuba abhaliswe nemizamo yokuqiniseka ukuthi amazinga kanye neziqu ezihlongozwayo aziwubandlululi ngokungafanele lomkhakha womphakathi ekwenzeni umsebenzi wayo wokuqiniseka ngamazinga  i etqa kudingeka ibe nokumeleleka kwabo bonke abathintekayo kuzwelonke 
inhloso ebalulekile yalokhu kumelwa ngukuqiniseka ngokubika emphakathini kanye nokuvuleleka 
ngaphezu kwalokhu yonke imibhalo yenqubomgomo ye saqa yabhalwa ngenqubo yokubonisana nabo bonke abathintekayo bese usakazwa ephephabhukwni likahulumeni ukuze umphakathi wenze iziphakamiso
zonke iziphakamiso zamalungu ezigungu ze saqa ngaphandle kwesigungu seziphathamandla akhishwa kuleli phephabhuku likahulumeni ngaphambi kokuba labobantu baqashwe ukuze umphakathi wenze iziphakamiso
ngaphezu kwalokhu yonke imibhalo ye saqa esephephabhukwini likahulumeni okudingeka umphakathi wenze iziphakamiso ngayo iyakhiswa ku website ayikhiphi imiyalelo evela ngaphezulu kodwa ivumela ukuthuthuka kwe nqf njengeyakhiwe ngumphakathi incazelo yayo ngukuxoxisana nabantu futhi iyoqhubeka ingemiswe ngabantu yabantu
ingukuhlelwa kwemiqondo yolwazi imicabango nokwenza kwabaseningizimu afrika abavela ezisekelweni ezahlukene imele imibono eyahlukene yomhlaba
i saqa iqinisekisa kanjani ukuthi amazinga akhona kuwo onke ama nqf
okuyompokophelo ye nqf kusekelwe ngaphansi komcabango wamaqophelo kuloluhlelo olusha
ngaphezu kwalokho i nqf isekela amazinga abandakanya ukumisa amazinga kanye neziqu ngaphambi kokubhalisa ne nqf zikalwa ngomgomo ovelwa ezimpokophelweni ze nqf ukuze kuqiniseke ukuthi iyahlangabezana nenqubo yomhlahlandlela weziqu ohlanganyelwe nosekela ukufunda impilo yonke
ngokufanayo isisekelo sikazwelonke nesomhlaba wonke sokuqiniseka ngempumelelo yalamazinga kugxile ekutheni kukhombisa imigomo kanye nezimpokophelo ezifanayo
ngokuletha ndawonye yonke imigomo kanye nenqubo yokwakha amazinga athuthukiswe ngokubambisana yizigungu ezinokumelwa nenqubo ye nsb kanye ne sgb bese kubhaliswa umhlahlandlela kuyoqiniseka ngokusebenza nangempumelelo yabo bonke abasebenzisa loluhlelo lokufunda lwe etqa
uhlelo lona ngokwalo lukhombisa inqubo yokumelwa kanye nokubambisana kwezigungu
kuyisiqiniseko sokuthi iqophelo lamazinga nempumelelo sekuvalekile
kungenxa yokuvala leso siyingi lapho uhlelo luvumela inqubekelaphambili ekwakhiweni kwamazinga neziqu nokuhlolisisa amazinga neziqu yilabo abawasebenzisayo lamazinga neziqu
ngamanye amazwi i nqf iluhlelo lokuqinisekisa nokuqhubeka nokuqinisekisa abafundi nabanye abasebenzisa imfundo nohlelo lokuqeqesha ukuthi amaphuzu imiklomelo kanye nezitifiketi ezikhishwe ngesikhathi kufundwa ziyahambisana namazinga abhalisiwe kulomhlahlandlela kanye nokuthi yonke imibandela ilethe imfundo ngamazinga afanayo nalawo okunikezwa igunya
i saqa ikwamukela kanjani obesekufundiwe ngaphambilini 
enye yezimpokophelo ze nqf isidingi sokwenza lula ukuthola imfundo inqubekelaphambili kwezemfundo uqeqesho kanye nezintuba kanye nesidingo sokusheshisa ukulungisa lokho okoniwa ubandlululo lwesikhathi esedlule kwezemfundo  uqeqesho kanye namathuba emisebenzi
i saqa inensalelo yokuba ifezekise lezimpokophelo ezimbili ukuthola indlela yokwamukela ukufunda okwenzeke ngaphandle kwalokho okwakumisiwe kwendabuko okuyikhona bekwamukelwa njengemfundo efanele esikhathini esedlule
i saqa isikhombise inhloso yayo yokukhulumisana namagatsha ngalendaba ye rpl njengendlela yokufezekisa ngokwenza lezizimpokophelo
i saqa ikhulume ngayo ngqo i rpl kumthethonkombiso ye nsb kanti futhi ikhulumile ngayo kumithethonkombiso ye etqa
kumthethonkombiso we nsb kubekiwe inqubo yokubhaliswa kweziqu
enye yezidingo ukuthi iziphakamiso ezihlongozwayo kufanele zikhombise ezimisweni ezemiklomelo ukuthi iziqu zingatholaka ngokuphelele noma ingxenye yazo ngokwamukela lokho okwakufundwe ngaphambili
iphuzu eliphakanyiswa lapha ukuthi umqondo we rlp umbandakanya noma kungelokhu kuphela impumelelo yokufunda kokuya esikoleni ukufunda kwangasese noma nokufunda okungesikho okwangasese kanye nolwazi olutholakala ngokusebenza
yini enye eyenziwa lihovisi le saqa
uma ngabe isisungulwe kahle isinabasebenzi ngokwanele i nlrd iyokwazi ukukhipha lemininingwane elandelayo  i saqa kanye namagatsha ayo okuyilawa   iziqu kanye namazinga abhaliswe ne nqf  ama etqa anikwe igunya kanye nalabo baletha imfundo   abasekeli ababhalisiwe   izigungu zokuhlolisisa  impumelelo yomfundi ngayedwa
i nlrd iyokwazi ukunikeza abenzi benqubomgomo imininigwane eyanele ukuze bathathe izinqumo ezihluzekile
i saqa inomthwalo wokubhekisisa iziqu zemfundo ikakhulukazi uma abantu bakwamanye amazwe befisa ukuzofunda kulezikhungo zemfundo zaseningizimu afrika noma befisa ukuzosebenza eningizimu afrika
i saqa inomtapo wezincwadi lapho igcina khona izincwadi ezikhishwe yiyona i saqa kanye neminye imibhalo ye saqa kanye neminye imibhalo engase idingwe ngabasebenzi be saqa ekwenzeni umsebenzi wabo
imininingwane ongathinta ngayo i saqa inombolo yocingo lwe saqa ithi   kanti inombolo ye fax  
uma ufuna ukuthola imininngwane ejwayelekile nge saqa kanye ne nqf xhumana nomtapo wezincwadi kulenombholo  
uma ufuna ulwazi ngokumiswa kwamazinga kanye nomsebenzi we nsbs noma i sgbs xhumana nomkhakha wezokumiswa kwamazinga kulenombolo yocingo   noma nge fax kulenombolo  
uma ufuna imininigwane ngokuqinisekisa ngamaqophelo kanye nomsebenzi we etqa xhumana nomkhakha wezokuqinisekisa ngamaqophelo ngocingo kulenombolo   noma nge fax kulenombolo  
uma ufuna imininingwane nge national learners records database xhumana ne nlrd ngocingo kulenombolo  
uma ufuna ulwazi ngokucuthungulwa kweziqu zakwamanye amazwe shayela kulenombolo yocingo  
ungaxhumana nehovisi elikhulu ngocingo kulenombolo   noma nge fax kulenombolo  
umbhalo we nsb inqubo yokukhiqiza kanye nokucubungula amazinga kanye neziqu ku nqf inqubo kanye nomhlanhlandlela wama etqa inqubo kanye nemihlahlandlela yabalethi bemfundo umhlahlandlela wokusekela i nqf ebhaliswe amazinga kanye neziqu i saqa ibuye ikhiphe isakaze izindaba ezisematheni nge saqa njalo njalo
lencwanjana ephepha linye ikunika imininingwane ngokuqhubekayo mayelana nezentuthuko kanye nokusentshenziswa kwe nqf
i saqa isakaza incwadi yombiko ngokuvamileyo okuhloswe ngayo ukuba abafundi bayo bahlale benolwazi olusha ngezinqumo nangentuthuko eyenzekayo ku saqa kanye nezimpikiswano ezikhona

ukwakhiwa komhlahlandlela wamazinga kazwelonke

indima  ezolimo nokongiwa kwemvelo b
indima  amasiko kanye nobuciko c

indima  izifundo zokuxhumana kanye nolwimiulimi e
indima  imfundo uqeqesho kanye nezentuthuko f
indima  ezezimboni  ubunjiniyela and kanye nobuchwepheshe etheknoloji g
indima  isayensi lezempilo kanye nokuletha usizo emphakathini j
indima  ezomzimba  izibalo  ikhompuyutha kanye nesayensi lempilo k
indima  ukudweba kanye nokwakha iziphathimandla ziyokwabela izindima incasiselo eyahlukile kuleyo naleyo ndima bese yehlukanisa leyo naleyo ndima ezindimaneni ezabelwe leso naleso siphathimandla eziyobe sezinika futhi izichasiselo ezahlukele kuleo naleyo ndimana

okudingekayo uma uzobhalisa amazinga

ukubhaliswa kweziqu ngokwesikhashana 
national standards bodies iyoba ingxenye enkulu yesigungu seziphathimandla  iyobika kuso isigungu seziphathimandla kanti kuyosungulwa umgwamanda owodwa waleyo naleyo ndima ngokuyalela kwesigaba  somthetho bese ubhaliswa isigungu seziphathimandla
uma kunendima engasungulelwanga i national standards bodies noma ibhaliswe i noma national standards bodies ebibhalisiwe isusuliwe noma isigungu seziphathimandla sibone kufanele isigungu seziphathimandla yisona eziyothatha senze umsebenzi kanye nemithwalo obizokwabela i national standards body ngokujwayelekile
lowo nalowo mgwamanda kuyothi emva kokusungulwa nokuqokwa kwamalunga awo unikwe isitifiketi sokubhaliswa yisigungu seziphathimandla  leso sitifiketi siyosebenza iminyaka emithathu kusukela osukwini inational standards bodies esungulwe ngalo
leyo naleyo national standards body kuyothi njalo ngenyanga yokuqala enyakeni wesithathu ibhalisiwe ifake isicelo sokuba ibhaliswe futhi  inikeze izizathu zokuthi yingani kufanele uvunyelwe ukuba ibhaliswa bese ibeka futhi ngempumelelo eyifezile eminyakeni emibili eyedlule ukwesulwa kokubhaliswa kwe national standards bodies

angithi abanye bafica indoda yakhile inezimpahla endlini kuthi ngoba lezizimpahla kungezenkosikazi endala engasekho umuzwe lona ozovusa umuzi ethi thengisa lesi sitofu somkakho ongasekho mina angifuni ukaba ngibasele esitofini sikamufi
thengisa nombhede ayelala kuwo thengisa ngisho namafenisha ayewasebenzisa ngoba nami ngifuna okwami okuqondene nami

kodwa ngacobeka ngoba ulizzie wayengenjalo
kwathi nalapho sesixoxa eyomshado kwabanguyena engimbona enezeluleko ezidle ngokuqina okwathi nami uma sengizibhekisisa ngazifica ukuthi zingamaqiniso ashaya emhlolweni kumuntu
